277 static void gl2psMsg(GLint level, const char *fmt, ...)
278 {
279  va_list args;
280 
281  if(!(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_SILENT)){
282  switch(level){
283  case GL2PS_INFO : fprintf(stderr, "GL2PS info: "); break;
284  case GL2PS_WARNING : fprintf(stderr, "GL2PS warning: "); break;
285  case GL2PS_ERROR : fprintf(stderr, "GL2PS error: "); break;
286  }
287  va_start(args, fmt);
288  vfprintf(stderr, fmt, args);
289  va_end(args);
290  fprintf(stderr, "\n");
291  }
292  /* if(level == GL2PS_ERROR) exit(1); */
293 }

295 static void *gl2psMalloc(size_t size)
296 {
297  void *ptr;
298 
299  if(!size) return NULL;
300  ptr = malloc(size);
301  if(!ptr){
302  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Couldn't allocate requested memory");
303  return NULL;
304  }
305  return ptr;
306 }
307 
308 static void *gl2psRealloc(void *ptr, size_t size)
309 {
310  void *orig = ptr;
311  if(!size) return NULL;
312  ptr = realloc(orig, size);
313  if(!ptr){
314  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Couldn't reallocate requested memory");
315  free(orig);
316  return NULL;
317  }
318  return ptr;
319 }

321 static void gl2psFree(void *ptr)
322 {
323  if(!ptr) return;
324  free(ptr);
325 }

327 static int gl2psWriteBigEndian(unsigned long data, int bytes)
328 {
329  int i;
330  int size = sizeof(unsigned long);
331  for(i = 1; i <= bytes; ++i){
332  fputc(0xff & (data >> (size - i) * 8), gl2ps->stream);
333  }
334  return bytes;
335 }

341 static void gl2psSetupCompress(void)
342 {
343  gl2ps->compress = (GL2PScompress*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PScompress));
344  gl2ps->compress->src = NULL;
345  gl2ps->compress->start = NULL;
346  gl2ps->compress->dest = NULL;
347  gl2ps->compress->srcLen = 0;
348  gl2ps->compress->destLen = 0;
349 }
350 
351 static void gl2psFreeCompress(void)
352 {
353  if(!gl2ps->compress)
354  return;
355  gl2psFree(gl2ps->compress->start);
356  gl2psFree(gl2ps->compress->dest);
357  gl2ps->compress->src = NULL;
358  gl2ps->compress->start = NULL;
359  gl2ps->compress->dest = NULL;
360  gl2ps->compress->srcLen = 0;
361  gl2ps->compress->destLen = 0;
362 }
363 
364 static int gl2psAllocCompress(unsigned int srcsize)
365 {
366  gl2psFreeCompress();
367 
368  if(!gl2ps->compress || !srcsize)
369  return GL2PS_ERROR;
370 
371  gl2ps->compress->srcLen = srcsize;
372  gl2ps->compress->destLen = (int)ceil(1.001 * gl2ps->compress->srcLen + 12);
373  gl2ps->compress->src = (Bytef*)gl2psMalloc(gl2ps->compress->srcLen);
374  gl2ps->compress->start = gl2ps->compress->src;
375  gl2ps->compress->dest = (Bytef*)gl2psMalloc(gl2ps->compress->destLen);
376 
377  return GL2PS_SUCCESS;
378 }
379 
380 static void *gl2psReallocCompress(unsigned int srcsize)
381 {
382  if(!gl2ps->compress || !srcsize)
383  return NULL;
384 
385  if(srcsize < gl2ps->compress->srcLen)
386  return gl2ps->compress->start;
387 
388  gl2ps->compress->srcLen = srcsize;
389  gl2ps->compress->destLen = (int)ceil(1.001 * gl2ps->compress->srcLen + 12);
390  gl2ps->compress->src = (Bytef*)gl2psRealloc(gl2ps->compress->src,
391  gl2ps->compress->srcLen);
392  gl2ps->compress->start = gl2ps->compress->src;
393  gl2ps->compress->dest = (Bytef*)gl2psRealloc(gl2ps->compress->dest,
394  gl2ps->compress->destLen);
395 
396  return gl2ps->compress->start;
397 }
398 
399 static int gl2psWriteBigEndianCompress(unsigned long data, int bytes)
400 {
401  int i;
402  int size = sizeof(unsigned long);
403  for(i = 1; i <= bytes; ++i){
404  *gl2ps->compress->src = (Bytef)(0xff & (data >> (size-i) * 8));
405  ++gl2ps->compress->src;
406  }
407  return bytes;
408 }

410 static int gl2psDeflate(void)
411 {
412  /* For compatibility with older zlib versions, we use compress(...)
413  instead of compress2(..., Z_BEST_COMPRESSION) */
414  return compress(gl2ps->compress->dest, &gl2ps->compress->destLen,
415  gl2ps->compress->start, gl2ps->compress->srcLen);
416 }
417 
418 #endif

420 static int gl2psPrintf(const char* fmt, ...)
421 {
422  int ret;
423  va_list args;
424 
425 #if defined(GL2PS_HAVE_ZLIB)
426  unsigned int oldsize = 0;
427  static char buf[1000];
428  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_COMPRESS){
429  va_start(args, fmt);
430  ret = vsprintf(buf, fmt, args);
431  va_end(args);
432  oldsize = gl2ps->compress->srcLen;
433  gl2ps->compress->start = (Bytef*)gl2psReallocCompress(oldsize + ret);
434  memcpy(gl2ps->compress->start+oldsize, buf, ret);
435  ret = 0;
436  }
437  else{
438 #endif
439  va_start(args, fmt);
440  ret = vfprintf(gl2ps->stream, fmt, args);
441  va_end(args);
442 #if defined(GL2PS_HAVE_ZLIB)
443  }
444 #endif
445  return ret;
446 }
447 
448 static void gl2psPrintGzipHeader(void)
449 {
450 #if defined(GL2PS_HAVE_ZLIB)
451  char tmp[10] = {'\x1f', '\x8b', /* magic numbers: 0x1f, 0x8b */
452  8, /* compression method: Z_DEFLATED */
453  0, /* flags */
454  0, 0, 0, 0, /* time */
455  2, /* extra flags: max compression */
456  '\x03'}; /* OS code: 0x03 (Unix) */
457 
458  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_COMPRESS){
459  gl2psSetupCompress();
460  /* add the gzip file header */
461  fwrite(tmp, 10, 1, gl2ps->stream);
462  }
463 #endif
464 }
465 
466 static void gl2psPrintGzipFooter(void)
467 {
468 #if defined(GL2PS_HAVE_ZLIB)
469  int n;
470  uLong crc, len;
471  char tmp[8];
472 
473  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_COMPRESS){
474  if(Z_OK != gl2psDeflate()){
475  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Zlib deflate error");
476  }
477  else{
478  /* determine the length of the header in the zlib stream */
479  n = 2; /* CMF+FLG */
480  if(gl2ps->compress->dest[1] & (1<<5)){
481  n += 4; /* DICTID */
482  }
483  /* write the data, without the zlib header and footer */
484  fwrite(gl2ps->compress->dest+n, gl2ps->compress->destLen-(n+4),
485  1, gl2ps->stream);
486  /* add the gzip file footer */
487  crc = crc32(0L, gl2ps->compress->start, gl2ps->compress->srcLen);
488  for(n = 0; n < 4; ++n){
489  tmp[n] = (char)(crc & 0xff);
490  crc >>= 8;
491  }
492  len = gl2ps->compress->srcLen;
493  for(n = 4; n < 8; ++n){
494  tmp[n] = (char)(len & 0xff);
495  len >>= 8;
496  }
497  fwrite(tmp, 8, 1, gl2ps->stream);
498  }
499  gl2psFreeCompress();
500  gl2psFree(gl2ps->compress);
501  gl2ps->compress = NULL;
502  }
503 #endif
504 }

508 static void gl2psListRealloc(GL2PSlist *list, GLint n)
509 {
510  if(!list){
511  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Cannot reallocate NULL list");
512  return;
513  }
514  if(n <= 0) return;
515  if(!list->array){
516  list->nmax = n;
517  list->array = (char*)gl2psMalloc(list->nmax * list->size);
518  }
519  else{
520  if(n > list->nmax){
521  list->nmax = ((n - 1) / list->incr + 1) * list->incr;
522  list->array = (char*)gl2psRealloc(list->array,
523  list->nmax * list->size);
524  }
525  }
526 }
527 
528 static GL2PSlist *gl2psListCreate(GLint n, GLint incr, GLint size)
529 {
530  GL2PSlist *list;
531 
532  if(n < 0) n = 0;
533  if(incr <= 0) incr = 1;
534  list = (GL2PSlist*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSlist));
535  list->nmax = 0;
536  list->incr = incr;
537  list->size = size;
538  list->n = 0;
539  list->array = NULL;
540  gl2psListRealloc(list, n);
541  return list;
542 }
543 
544 static void gl2psListReset(GL2PSlist *list)
545 {
546  if(!list) return;
547  list->n = 0;
548 }

550 static void gl2psListDelete(GL2PSlist *list)
551 {
552  if(!list) return;
553  gl2psFree(list->array);
554  gl2psFree(list);
555 }

557 static void gl2psListAdd(GL2PSlist *list, void *data)
558 {
559  if(!list){
560  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Cannot add into unallocated list");
561  return;
562  }
563  list->n++;
564  gl2psListRealloc(list, list->n);
565  memcpy(&list->array[(list->n - 1) * list->size], data, list->size);
566 }
567 
568 static int gl2psListNbr(GL2PSlist *list)
569 {
570  if(!list)
571  return 0;
572  return list->n;
573 }
574 
575 static void *gl2psListPointer(GL2PSlist *list, GLint index)
576 {
577  if(!list){
578  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Cannot point into unallocated list");
579  return NULL;
580  }
581  if((index < 0) || (index >= list->n)){
582  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Wrong list index in gl2psListPointer");
583  return NULL;
584  }
585  return &list->array[index * list->size];
586 }
587 
588 static void gl2psListSort(GL2PSlist *list,
589  int (*fcmp)(const void *a, const void *b))
590 {
591  if(!list)
592  return;
593  qsort(list->array, list->n, list->size, fcmp);
594 }

596 static void gl2psListAction(GL2PSlist *list, void (*action)(void *data))
597 {
598  GLint i;
599 
600  for(i = 0; i < gl2psListNbr(list); i++){
601  (*action)(gl2psListPointer(list, i));
602  }
603 }
604 
605 static void gl2psListActionInverse(GL2PSlist *list, void (*action)(void *data))
606 {
607  GLint i;
608 
609  for(i = gl2psListNbr(list); i > 0; i--){
610  (*action)(gl2psListPointer(list, i-1));
611  }
612 }

616 static void gl2psListRead(GL2PSlist *list, int index, void *data)
617 {
618  if((index < 0) || (index >= list->n))
619  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Wrong list index in gl2psListRead");

623 static void gl2psEncodeBase64Block(unsigned char in[3], unsigned char out[4], int len)
624 {
625  static const char cb64[] =
626  "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/";
627 
628  out[0] = cb64[ in[0] >> 2 ];
629  out[1] = cb64[ ((in[0] & 0x03) << 4) | ((in[1] & 0xf0) >> 4) ];
630  out[2] = (len > 1) ? cb64[ ((in[1] & 0x0f) << 2) | ((in[2] & 0xc0) >> 6) ] : '=';
631  out[3] = (len > 2) ? cb64[ in[2] & 0x3f ] : '=';
632 }
633 
634 static void gl2psListEncodeBase64(GL2PSlist *list)
635 {
636  unsigned char *buffer, in[3], out[4];
637  int i, n, index, len;
638 
639  n = list->n * list->size;
640  buffer = (unsigned char*)gl2psMalloc(n * sizeof(unsigned char));
641  memcpy(buffer, list->array, n * sizeof(unsigned char));
642  gl2psListReset(list);
643 
644  index = 0;
645  while(index < n) {
646  len = 0;
647  for(i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
648  if(index < n){
649  in[i] = buffer[index];
650  len++;
651  }
652  else{
653  in[i] = 0;
654  }
655  index++;
656  }
657  if(len) {
658  gl2psEncodeBase64Block(in, out, len);
659  for(i = 0; i < 4; i++)
660  gl2psListAdd(list, &out[i]);
661  }
662  }
663  gl2psFree(buffer);
664 }
665 
666 #endif

668 /* Helpers for rgba colors */
669 
670 static GLboolean gl2psSameColor(GL2PSrgba rgba1, GL2PSrgba rgba2)
671 {
672  if(!GL2PS_ZERO(rgba1[0] - rgba2[0]) ||
673  !GL2PS_ZERO(rgba1[1] - rgba2[1]) ||
674  !GL2PS_ZERO(rgba1[2] - rgba2[2]))
675  return GL_FALSE;
676  return GL_TRUE;
677 }
678 
679 static GLboolean gl2psVertsSameColor(const GL2PSprimitive *prim)
680 {
681  int i;
682 
683  for(i = 1; i < prim->numverts; i++){
684  if(!gl2psSameColor(prim->verts[0].rgba, prim->verts[i].rgba)){
685  return GL_FALSE;
686  }
687  }
688  return GL_TRUE;
689 }

691 static GLboolean gl2psSameColorThreshold(int n, GL2PSrgba rgba[],
692  GL2PSrgba threshold)
693 {
694  int i;
695 
696  if(n < 2) return GL_TRUE;
697 
698  for(i = 1; i < n; i++){
699  if(fabs(rgba[0][0] - rgba[i][0]) > threshold[0] ||
700  fabs(rgba[0][1] - rgba[i][1]) > threshold[1] ||
701  fabs(rgba[0][2] - rgba[i][2]) > threshold[2])
702  return GL_FALSE;
703  }
704 
705  return GL_TRUE;
706 }
707 
708 static void gl2psSetLastColor(GL2PSrgba rgba)
709 {
710  int i;
711  for(i = 0; i < 3; ++i){
712  gl2ps->lastrgba[i] = rgba[i];
713  }
714 }
715 
716 static GLfloat gl2psGetRGB(GL2PSimage *im, GLuint x, GLuint y,
717  GLfloat *red, GLfloat *green, GLfloat *blue)
718 {
719 
720  GLsizei width = im->width;
721  GLsizei height = im->height;
722  GLfloat *pixels = im->pixels;
723  GLfloat *pimag;
724 
725  /* OpenGL image is from down to up, PS image is up to down */
726  switch(im->format){
727  case GL_RGBA:
728  pimag = pixels + 4 * (width * (height - 1 - y) + x);
729  break;
730  case GL_RGB:
731  default:
732  pimag = pixels + 3 * (width * (height - 1 - y) + x);
733  break;
734  }
735  *red = *pimag; pimag++;
736  *green = *pimag; pimag++;
737  *blue = *pimag; pimag++;
738 
739  return (im->format == GL_RGBA) ? *pimag : 1.0F;
740 }

742 /* Helper routines for pixmaps */
743 
744 static GL2PSimage *gl2psCopyPixmap(GL2PSimage *im)
745 {
746  int size;
747  GL2PSimage *image = (GL2PSimage*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSimage));
748 
749  image->width = im->width;
750  image->height = im->height;
751  image->format = im->format;
752  image->type = im->type;
753  image->zoom_x = im->zoom_x;
754  image->zoom_y = im->zoom_y;
755 
756  switch(image->format){
757  case GL_RGBA:
758  size = image->height * image->width * 4 * sizeof(GLfloat);
759  break;
760  case GL_RGB:
761  default:
762  size = image->height * image->width * 3 * sizeof(GLfloat);
763  break;
764  }
765 
766  image->pixels = (GLfloat*)gl2psMalloc(size);
767  memcpy(image->pixels, im->pixels, size);
768 
769  return image;
770 }
771 
772 static void gl2psFreePixmap(GL2PSimage *im)
773 {
774  if(!im)
775  return;
776  gl2psFree(im->pixels);
777  gl2psFree(im);
778 }

780 #if defined(GL2PS_HAVE_LIBPNG)
781 
782 #if !defined(png_jmpbuf)
783 # define png_jmpbuf(png_ptr) ((png_ptr)->jmpbuf)
784 #endif

786 static void gl2psUserWritePNG(png_structp png_ptr, png_bytep data, png_size_t length)
787 {
788  unsigned int i;
789  GL2PSlist *png = (GL2PSlist*)png_get_io_ptr(png_ptr);
790  for(i = 0; i < length; i++)
791  gl2psListAdd(png, &data[i]);
792 }

794 static void gl2psUserFlushPNG(png_structp png_ptr)
795 {
796  (void) png_ptr; /* not used */
797 }
798 
799 static void gl2psConvertPixmapToPNG(GL2PSimage *pixmap, GL2PSlist *png)
800 {
801  png_structp png_ptr;
802  png_infop info_ptr;
803  unsigned char *row_data;
804  GLfloat dr, dg, db;
805  int row, col;
806 
807  if(!(png_ptr = png_create_write_struct(PNG_LIBPNG_VER_STRING, NULL, NULL, NULL)))
808  return;
809 
810  if(!(info_ptr = png_create_info_struct(png_ptr))){
811  png_destroy_write_struct(&png_ptr, NULL);
812  return;
813  }
814 
815  if(setjmp(png_jmpbuf(png_ptr))) {
816  png_destroy_write_struct(&png_ptr, &info_ptr);
817  return;
818  }
819 
820  png_set_write_fn(png_ptr, (void *)png, gl2psUserWritePNG, gl2psUserFlushPNG);
821  png_set_compression_level(png_ptr, Z_DEFAULT_COMPRESSION);
822  png_set_IHDR(png_ptr, info_ptr, pixmap->width, pixmap->height, 8,
823  PNG_COLOR_TYPE_RGB, PNG_INTERLACE_NONE, PNG_COMPRESSION_TYPE_BASE,
824  PNG_FILTER_TYPE_BASE);
825  png_write_info(png_ptr, info_ptr);
826 
827  row_data = (unsigned char*)gl2psMalloc(3 * pixmap->width * sizeof(unsigned char));
828  for(row = 0; row < pixmap->height; row++){
829  for(col = 0; col < pixmap->width; col++){
830  gl2psGetRGB(pixmap, col, row, &dr, &dg, &db);
831  row_data[3*col] = (unsigned char)(255. * dr);
832  row_data[3*col+1] = (unsigned char)(255. * dg);
833  row_data[3*col+2] = (unsigned char)(255. * db);
834  }
835  png_write_row(png_ptr, (png_bytep)row_data);
836  }
837  gl2psFree(row_data);
838 
839  png_write_end(png_ptr, info_ptr);
840  png_destroy_write_struct(&png_ptr, &info_ptr);
841 }
842 
843 #endif

845 /* Helper routines for text strings */
846 
847 static GLint gl2psAddText(GLint type, const char *str, const char *fontname,
848  GLshort fontsize, GLint alignment, GLfloat angle)
849 {
850  GLfloat pos[4];
851  GL2PSprimitive *prim;
852  GLboolean valid;
853 
854  if(!gl2ps || !str || !fontname) return GL2PS_UNINITIALIZED;
855 
856  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_NO_TEXT) return GL2PS_SUCCESS;
857 
858  glGetBooleanv(GL_CURRENT_RASTER_POSITION_VALID, &valid);
859  if(GL_FALSE == valid) return GL2PS_SUCCESS; /* the primitive is culled */
860 
861  glGetFloatv(GL_CURRENT_RASTER_POSITION, pos);
862 
863  prim = (GL2PSprimitive*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSprimitive));
864  prim->type = type;
865  prim->boundary = 0;
866  prim->numverts = 1;
867  prim->verts = (GL2PSvertex*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSvertex));
868  prim->verts[0].xyz[0] = pos[0];
869  prim->verts[0].xyz[1] = pos[1];
870  prim->verts[0].xyz[2] = pos[2];
871  prim->culled = 0;
872  prim->offset = 0;
873  prim->pattern = 0;
874  prim->factor = 0;
875  prim->width = 1;
876  glGetFloatv(GL_CURRENT_RASTER_COLOR, prim->verts[0].rgba);
877  prim->data.text = (GL2PSstring*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSstring));
878  prim->data.text->str = (char*)gl2psMalloc((strlen(str)+1)*sizeof(char));
879  strcpy(prim->data.text->str, str);
880  prim->data.text->fontname = (char*)gl2psMalloc((strlen(fontname)+1)*sizeof(char));
881  strcpy(prim->data.text->fontname, fontname);
882  prim->data.text->fontsize = fontsize;
883  prim->data.text->alignment = alignment;
884  prim->data.text->angle = angle;
885 
886  gl2psListAdd(gl2ps->auxprimitives, &prim);
887  glPassThrough(GL2PS_TEXT_TOKEN);
888 
889  return GL2PS_SUCCESS;
890 }
891 
892 static GL2PSstring *gl2psCopyText(GL2PSstring *t)
893 {
894  GL2PSstring *text = (GL2PSstring*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSstring));
895  text->str = (char*)gl2psMalloc((strlen(t->str)+1)*sizeof(char));
896  strcpy(text->str, t->str);
897  text->fontname = (char*)gl2psMalloc((strlen(t->fontname)+1)*sizeof(char));
898  strcpy(text->fontname, t->fontname);
899  text->fontsize = t->fontsize;
900  text->alignment = t->alignment;
901  text->angle = t->angle;
902 
903  return text;
904 }
905 
906 static void gl2psFreeText(GL2PSstring *text)
907 {
908  if(!text)
909  return;
910  gl2psFree(text->str);
911  gl2psFree(text->fontname);
912  gl2psFree(text);
913 }

915 /* Helpers for blending modes */
916 
917 static GLboolean gl2psSupportedBlendMode(GLenum sfactor, GLenum dfactor)
918 {
919  /* returns TRUE if gl2ps supports the argument combination: only two
920  blending modes have been implemented so far */
921 
922  if( (sfactor == GL_SRC_ALPHA && dfactor == GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA) ||
923  (sfactor == GL_ONE && dfactor == GL_ZERO) )
924  return GL_TRUE;
925  return GL_FALSE;
926 }
927 
928 static void gl2psAdaptVertexForBlending(GL2PSvertex *v)
929 {
930  /* Transforms vertex depending on the actual blending function -
931  currently the vertex v is considered as source vertex and his
932  alpha value is changed to 1.0 if source blending GL_ONE is
933  active. This might be extended in the future */
934 
935  if(!v || !gl2ps)
936  return;
937 
938  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_NO_BLENDING || !gl2ps->blending){
939  v->rgba[3] = 1.0F;
940  return;
941  }
942 
943  switch(gl2ps->blendfunc[0]){
944  case GL_ONE:
945  v->rgba[3] = 1.0F;
946  break;
947  default:
948  break;
949  }
950 }

952 static void gl2psAssignTriangleProperties(GL2PStriangle *t)
953 {
954  /* int i; */
955 
956  t->prop = T_VAR_COLOR;
957 
958  /* Uncommenting the following lines activates an even more fine
959  grained distinction between triangle types - please don't delete,
960  a remarkable amount of PDF handling code inside this file depends
961  on it if activated */
962  /*
963  t->prop = T_CONST_COLOR;
964  for(i = 0; i < 3; ++i){
965  if(!GL2PS_ZERO(t->vertex[0].rgba[i] - t->vertex[1].rgba[i]) ||
966  !GL2PS_ZERO(t->vertex[1].rgba[i] - t->vertex[2].rgba[i])){
967  t->prop = T_VAR_COLOR;
968  break;
969  }
970  }
971  */
972 
973  if(!GL2PS_ZERO(t->vertex[0].rgba[3] - t->vertex[1].rgba[3]) ||
974  !GL2PS_ZERO(t->vertex[1].rgba[3] - t->vertex[2].rgba[3])){
975  t->prop |= T_VAR_ALPHA;
976  }
977  else{
978  if(t->vertex[0].rgba[3] < 1)
979  t->prop |= T_ALPHA_LESS_1;
980  else
981  t->prop |= T_ALPHA_1;
982  }
983 }

985 static void gl2psFillTriangleFromPrimitive(GL2PStriangle *t, GL2PSprimitive *p,
986  GLboolean assignprops)

991  if(GL_TRUE == assignprops)
992  gl2psAssignTriangleProperties(t);

995 static void gl2psInitTriangle(GL2PStriangle *t)
996 {
997  int i;
998  GL2PSvertex vertex = { {-1.0F, -1.0F, -1.0F}, {-1.0F, -1.0F, -1.0F, -1.0F} };
999  for(i = 0; i < 3; i++)
1000  t->vertex[i] = vertex;

1006 static GL2PSprimitive *gl2psCopyPrimitive(GL2PSprimitive *p)
1007 {
1008  GL2PSprimitive *prim;
1009 
1010  if(!p){
1011  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Trying to copy an empty primitive");
1012  return NULL;
1013  }
1014 
1015  prim = (GL2PSprimitive*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSprimitive));
1016 
1017  prim->type = p->type;
1018  prim->numverts = p->numverts;
1019  prim->boundary = p->boundary;
1020  prim->offset = p->offset;
1021  prim->pattern = p->pattern;
1022  prim->factor = p->factor;
1023  prim->culled = p->culled;
1024  prim->width = p->width;
1025  prim->verts = (GL2PSvertex*)gl2psMalloc(p->numverts*sizeof(GL2PSvertex));
1026  memcpy(prim->verts, p->verts, p->numverts * sizeof(GL2PSvertex));
1027 
1028  switch(prim->type){
1029  case GL2PS_PIXMAP :
1030  prim->data.image = gl2psCopyPixmap(p->data.image);
1031  break;
1032  case GL2PS_TEXT :
1033  case GL2PS_SPECIAL :
1034  prim->data.text = gl2psCopyText(p->data.text);
1035  break;
1036  default:
1037  break;
1038  }
1039 
1040  return prim;
1041 }

1043 static GLboolean gl2psSamePosition(GL2PSxyz p1, GL2PSxyz p2)
1044 {
1045  if(!GL2PS_ZERO(p1[0] - p2[0]) ||
1046  !GL2PS_ZERO(p1[1] - p2[1]) ||
1047  !GL2PS_ZERO(p1[2] - p2[2]))
1048  return GL_FALSE;
1049  return GL_TRUE;
1050 }
1051 
1052 /*********************************************************************
1053  *
1054  * 3D sorting routines
1055  *
1056  *********************************************************************/
1057 
1058 static GLfloat gl2psComparePointPlane(GL2PSxyz point, GL2PSplane plane)
1059 {
1060  return (plane[0] * point[0] +
1061  plane[1] * point[1] +
1062  plane[2] * point[2] +
1063  plane[3]);
1064 }
1065 
1066 static GLfloat gl2psPsca(GLfloat *a, GLfloat *b)
1067 {
1068  return (a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[1] + a[2]*b[2]);
1069 }
1070 
1071 static void gl2psPvec(GLfloat *a, GLfloat *b, GLfloat *c)
1072 {
1073  c[0] = a[1]*b[2] - a[2]*b[1];
1074  c[1] = a[2]*b[0] - a[0]*b[2];
1075  c[2] = a[0]*b[1] - a[1]*b[0];
1076 }
1077 
1078 static GLfloat gl2psNorm(GLfloat *a)
1079 {
1080  return (GLfloat)sqrt(a[0]*a[0] + a[1]*a[1] + a[2]*a[2]);
1081 }
1082 
1083 static void gl2psGetNormal(GLfloat *a, GLfloat *b, GLfloat *c)
1084 {
1085  GLfloat norm;
1086 
1087  gl2psPvec(a, b, c);
1088  if(!GL2PS_ZERO(norm = gl2psNorm(c))){
1089  c[0] = c[0] / norm;
1090  c[1] = c[1] / norm;
1091  c[2] = c[2] / norm;
1092  }
1093  else{
1094  /* The plane is still wrong despite our tests in gl2psGetPlane.
1095  Let's return a dummy value for now (this is a hack: we should
1096  do more intelligent tests in GetPlane) */
1097  c[0] = c[1] = 0.0F;
1098  c[2] = 1.0F;
1099  }
1100 }
1101 
1102 static void gl2psGetPlane(GL2PSprimitive *prim, GL2PSplane plane)
1103 {
1104  GL2PSxyz v = {0.0F, 0.0F, 0.0F}, w = {0.0F, 0.0F, 0.0F};
1105 
1106  switch(prim->type){
1107  case GL2PS_TRIANGLE :
1108  case GL2PS_QUADRANGLE :
1109  v[0] = prim->verts[1].xyz[0] - prim->verts[0].xyz[0];
1110  v[1] = prim->verts[1].xyz[1] - prim->verts[0].xyz[1];
1111  v[2] = prim->verts[1].xyz[2] - prim->verts[0].xyz[2];
1112  w[0] = prim->verts[2].xyz[0] - prim->verts[0].xyz[0];
1113  w[1] = prim->verts[2].xyz[1] - prim->verts[0].xyz[1];
1114  w[2] = prim->verts[2].xyz[2] - prim->verts[0].xyz[2];
1115  if((GL2PS_ZERO(v[0]) && GL2PS_ZERO(v[1]) && GL2PS_ZERO(v[2])) ||
1116  (GL2PS_ZERO(w[0]) && GL2PS_ZERO(w[1]) && GL2PS_ZERO(w[2]))){
1117  plane[0] = plane[1] = 0.0F;
1118  plane[2] = 1.0F;
1119  plane[3] = -prim->verts[0].xyz[2];
1120  }
1121  else{
1122  gl2psGetNormal(v, w, plane);
1123  plane[3] =
1124  - plane[0] * prim->verts[0].xyz[0]
1125  - plane[1] * prim->verts[0].xyz[1]
1126  - plane[2] * prim->verts[0].xyz[2];
1127  }
1128  break;
1129  case GL2PS_LINE :
1130  v[0] = prim->verts[1].xyz[0] - prim->verts[0].xyz[0];
1131  v[1] = prim->verts[1].xyz[1] - prim->verts[0].xyz[1];
1132  v[2] = prim->verts[1].xyz[2] - prim->verts[0].xyz[2];
1133  if(GL2PS_ZERO(v[0]) && GL2PS_ZERO(v[1]) && GL2PS_ZERO(v[2])){
1134  plane[0] = plane[1] = 0.0F;
1135  plane[2] = 1.0F;
1136  plane[3] = -prim->verts[0].xyz[2];
1137  }
1138  else{
1139  if(GL2PS_ZERO(v[0])) w[0] = 1.0F;
1140  else if(GL2PS_ZERO(v[1])) w[1] = 1.0F;
1141  else w[2] = 1.0F;
1142  gl2psGetNormal(v, w, plane);
1143  plane[3] =
1144  - plane[0] * prim->verts[0].xyz[0]
1145  - plane[1] * prim->verts[0].xyz[1]
1146  - plane[2] * prim->verts[0].xyz[2];
1147  }
1148  break;
1149  case GL2PS_POINT :
1150  case GL2PS_PIXMAP :
1151  case GL2PS_TEXT :
1152  case GL2PS_SPECIAL :
1153  case GL2PS_IMAGEMAP:
1154  plane[0] = plane[1] = 0.0F;
1155  plane[2] = 1.0F;
1156  plane[3] = -prim->verts[0].xyz[2];
1157  break;
1158  default :
1159  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Unknown primitive type in BSP tree");
1160  plane[0] = plane[1] = plane[3] = 0.0F;
1161  plane[2] = 1.0F;
1162  break;
1163  }
1164 }
1165 
1166 static void gl2psCutEdge(GL2PSvertex *a, GL2PSvertex *b, GL2PSplane plane,
1167  GL2PSvertex *c)
1168 {
1169  GL2PSxyz v;
1170  GLfloat sect, psca;
1171 
1172  v[0] = b->xyz[0] - a->xyz[0];
1173  v[1] = b->xyz[1] - a->xyz[1];
1174  v[2] = b->xyz[2] - a->xyz[2];
1175 
1176  if(!GL2PS_ZERO(psca = gl2psPsca(plane, v)))
1177  sect = -gl2psComparePointPlane(a->xyz, plane) / psca;
1178  else
1179  sect = 0.0F;
1180 
1181  c->xyz[0] = a->xyz[0] + v[0] * sect;
1182  c->xyz[1] = a->xyz[1] + v[1] * sect;
1183  c->xyz[2] = a->xyz[2] + v[2] * sect;
1184 
1185  c->rgba[0] = (1 - sect) * a->rgba[0] + sect * b->rgba[0];
1186  c->rgba[1] = (1 - sect) * a->rgba[1] + sect * b->rgba[1];
1187  c->rgba[2] = (1 - sect) * a->rgba[2] + sect * b->rgba[2];
1188  c->rgba[3] = (1 - sect) * a->rgba[3] + sect * b->rgba[3];
1189 }
1190 
1191 static void gl2psCreateSplitPrimitive(GL2PSprimitive *parent, GL2PSplane plane,
1192  GL2PSprimitive *child, GLshort numverts,
1193  GLshort *index0, GLshort *index1)
1194 {
1195  GLshort i;
1196 
1197  if(parent->type == GL2PS_IMAGEMAP){
1198  child->type = GL2PS_IMAGEMAP;
1199  child->data.image = parent->data.image;
1200  }
1201  else{
1202  if(numverts > 4){
1203  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_WARNING, "%d vertices in polygon", numverts);
1204  numverts = 4;
1205  }
1206  switch(numverts){
1207  case 1 : child->type = GL2PS_POINT; break;
1208  case 2 : child->type = GL2PS_LINE; break;
1209  case 3 : child->type = GL2PS_TRIANGLE; break;
1210  case 4 : child->type = GL2PS_QUADRANGLE; break;
1211  default: child->type = GL2PS_NO_TYPE; break;
1212  }
1213  }
1214 
1215  child->boundary = 0; /* FIXME: not done! */
1216  child->culled = parent->culled;
1217  child->offset = parent->offset;
1218  child->pattern = parent->pattern;
1219  child->factor = parent->factor;
1220  child->width = parent->width;
1221  child->numverts = numverts;
1222  child->verts = (GL2PSvertex*)gl2psMalloc(numverts * sizeof(GL2PSvertex));
1223 
1224  for(i = 0; i < numverts; i++){
1225  if(index1[i] < 0){
1226  child->verts[i] = parent->verts[index0[i]];
1227  }
1228  else{
1229  gl2psCutEdge(&parent->verts[index0[i]], &parent->verts[index1[i]],
1230  plane, &child->verts[i]);
1231  }
1232  }
1233 }
1234 
1235 static void gl2psAddIndex(GLshort *index0, GLshort *index1, GLshort *nb,
1236  GLshort i, GLshort j)
1237 {
1238  GLint k;
1239 
1240  for(k = 0; k < *nb; k++){
1241  if((index0[k] == i && index1[k] == j) ||
1242  (index1[k] == i && index0[k] == j)) return;
1243  }
1244  index0[*nb] = i;
1245  index1[*nb] = j;
1246  (*nb)++;
1247 }
1248 
1249 static GLshort gl2psGetIndex(GLshort i, GLshort num)
1250 {
1251  return (i < num - 1) ? i + 1 : 0;
1252 }
1253 
1254 static GLint gl2psTestSplitPrimitive(GL2PSprimitive *prim, GL2PSplane plane)
1255 {
1256  GLint type = GL2PS_COINCIDENT;
1257  GLshort i, j;
1258  GLfloat d[5];
1259 
1260  for(i = 0; i < prim->numverts; i++){
1261  d[i] = gl2psComparePointPlane(prim->verts[i].xyz, plane);
1262  }
1263 
1264  if(prim->numverts < 2){
1265  return 0;
1266  }
1267  else{
1268  for(i = 0; i < prim->numverts; i++){
1269  j = gl2psGetIndex(i, prim->numverts);
1270  if(d[j] > GL2PS_EPSILON){
1271  if(type == GL2PS_COINCIDENT) type = GL2PS_IN_BACK_OF;
1272  else if(type != GL2PS_IN_BACK_OF) return 1;
1273  if(d[i] < -GL2PS_EPSILON) return 1;
1274  }
1275  else if(d[j] < -GL2PS_EPSILON){
1276  if(type == GL2PS_COINCIDENT) type = GL2PS_IN_FRONT_OF;
1277  else if(type != GL2PS_IN_FRONT_OF) return 1;
1278  if(d[i] > GL2PS_EPSILON) return 1;
1279  }
1280  }
1281  }
1282  return 0;
1283 }
1284 
1285 static GLint gl2psSplitPrimitive(GL2PSprimitive *prim, GL2PSplane plane,
1286  GL2PSprimitive **front, GL2PSprimitive **back)
1287 {
1288  GLshort i, j, in = 0, out = 0, in0[5], in1[5], out0[5], out1[5];
1289  GLint type;
1290  GLfloat d[5];
1291 
1292  type = GL2PS_COINCIDENT;
1293 
1294  for(i = 0; i < prim->numverts; i++){
1295  d[i] = gl2psComparePointPlane(prim->verts[i].xyz, plane);
1296  }
1297 
1298  switch(prim->type){
1299  case GL2PS_POINT :
1300  if(d[0] > GL2PS_EPSILON) type = GL2PS_IN_BACK_OF;
1301  else if(d[0] < -GL2PS_EPSILON) type = GL2PS_IN_FRONT_OF;
1302  else type = GL2PS_COINCIDENT;
1303  break;
1304  default :
1305  for(i = 0; i < prim->numverts; i++){
1306  j = gl2psGetIndex(i, prim->numverts);
1307  if(d[j] > GL2PS_EPSILON){
1308  if(type == GL2PS_COINCIDENT) type = GL2PS_IN_BACK_OF;
1309  else if(type != GL2PS_IN_BACK_OF) type = GL2PS_SPANNING;
1310  if(d[i] < -GL2PS_EPSILON){
1311  gl2psAddIndex(in0, in1, &in, i, j);
1312  gl2psAddIndex(out0, out1, &out, i, j);
1313  type = GL2PS_SPANNING;
1314  }
1315  gl2psAddIndex(out0, out1, &out, j, -1);
1316  }
1317  else if(d[j] < -GL2PS_EPSILON){
1318  if(type == GL2PS_COINCIDENT) type = GL2PS_IN_FRONT_OF;
1319  else if(type != GL2PS_IN_FRONT_OF) type = GL2PS_SPANNING;
1320  if(d[i] > GL2PS_EPSILON){
1321  gl2psAddIndex(in0, in1, &in, i, j);
1322  gl2psAddIndex(out0, out1, &out, i, j);
1323  type = GL2PS_SPANNING;
1324  }
1325  gl2psAddIndex(in0, in1, &in, j, -1);
1326  }
1327  else{
1328  gl2psAddIndex(in0, in1, &in, j, -1);
1329  gl2psAddIndex(out0, out1, &out, j, -1);
1330  }
1331  }
1332  break;
1333  }
1334 
1335  if(type == GL2PS_SPANNING){
1336  *back = (GL2PSprimitive*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSprimitive));
1337  *front = (GL2PSprimitive*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSprimitive));
1338  gl2psCreateSplitPrimitive(prim, plane, *back, out, out0, out1);
1339  gl2psCreateSplitPrimitive(prim, plane, *front, in, in0, in1);
1340  }
1341 
1342  return type;
1343 }
1344 
1345 static void gl2psDivideQuad(GL2PSprimitive *quad,
1346  GL2PSprimitive **t1, GL2PSprimitive **t2)
1347 {
1348  *t1 = (GL2PSprimitive*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSprimitive));
1349  *t2 = (GL2PSprimitive*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSprimitive));
1350  (*t1)->type = (*t2)->type = GL2PS_TRIANGLE;
1351  (*t1)->numverts = (*t2)->numverts = 3;
1352  (*t1)->culled = (*t2)->culled = quad->culled;
1353  (*t1)->offset = (*t2)->offset = quad->offset;
1354  (*t1)->pattern = (*t2)->pattern = quad->pattern;
1355  (*t1)->factor = (*t2)->factor = quad->factor;
1356  (*t1)->width = (*t2)->width = quad->width;
1357  (*t1)->verts = (GL2PSvertex*)gl2psMalloc(3 * sizeof(GL2PSvertex));
1358  (*t2)->verts = (GL2PSvertex*)gl2psMalloc(3 * sizeof(GL2PSvertex));
1359  (*t1)->verts[0] = quad->verts[0];
1360  (*t1)->verts[1] = quad->verts[1];
1361  (*t1)->verts[2] = quad->verts[2];
1362  (*t1)->boundary = ((quad->boundary & 1) ? 1 : 0) | ((quad->boundary & 2) ? 2 : 0);
1363  (*t2)->verts[0] = quad->verts[0];
1364  (*t2)->verts[1] = quad->verts[2];
1365  (*t2)->verts[2] = quad->verts[3];
1366  (*t2)->boundary = ((quad->boundary & 4) ? 2 : 0) | ((quad->boundary & 8) ? 4 : 0);
1367 }
1368 
1369 static int gl2psCompareDepth(const void *a, const void *b)
1370 {
1371  const GL2PSprimitive *q, *w;
1372  GLfloat dq = 0.0F, dw = 0.0F, diff;
1373  int i;
1374 
1375  q = *(const GL2PSprimitive* const*)a;
1376  w = *(const GL2PSprimitive* const*)b;
1377 
1378  for(i = 0; i < q->numverts; i++){
1379  dq += q->verts[i].xyz[2];
1380  }
1381  dq /= (GLfloat)q->numverts;
1382 
1383  for(i = 0; i < w->numverts; i++){
1384  dw += w->verts[i].xyz[2];
1385  }
1386  dw /= (GLfloat)w->numverts;
1387 
1388  diff = dq - dw;
1389  if(diff > 0.){
1390  return -1;
1391  }
1392  else if(diff < 0.){
1393  return 1;
1394  }
1395  else{
1396  return 0;
1397  }
1398 }
1399 
1400 static int gl2psTrianglesFirst(const void *a, const void *b)
1401 {
1402  const GL2PSprimitive *q, *w;
1403 
1404  q = *(const GL2PSprimitive* const*)a;
1405  w = *(const GL2PSprimitive* const*)b;
1406  return (q->type < w->type ? 1 : -1);
1407 }
1408 
1409 static GLint gl2psFindRoot(GL2PSlist *primitives, GL2PSprimitive **root)
1410 {
1411  GLint i, j, count, best = 1000000, index = 0;
1412  GL2PSprimitive *prim1, *prim2;
1413  GL2PSplane plane;
1414  GLint maxp;
1415 
1416  if(!gl2psListNbr(primitives)){
1417  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Cannot fint root in empty primitive list");
1418  return 0;
1419  }
1420 
1421  *root = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(primitives, 0);
1422 
1423  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_BEST_ROOT){
1424  maxp = gl2psListNbr(primitives);
1425  if(maxp > gl2ps->maxbestroot){
1426  maxp = gl2ps->maxbestroot;
1427  }
1428  for(i = 0; i < maxp; i++){
1429  prim1 = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(primitives, i);
1430  gl2psGetPlane(prim1, plane);
1431  count = 0;
1432  for(j = 0; j < gl2psListNbr(primitives); j++){
1433  if(j != i){
1434  prim2 = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(primitives, j);
1435  count += gl2psTestSplitPrimitive(prim2, plane);
1436  }
1437  if(count > best) break;
1438  }
1439  if(count < best){
1440  best = count;
1441  index = i;
1442  *root = prim1;
1443  if(!count) return index;
1444  }
1445  }
1446  /* if(index) gl2psMsg(GL2PS_INFO, "GL2PS_BEST_ROOT was worth it: %d", index); */
1447  return index;
1448  }
1449  else{
1450  return 0;
1451  }
1452 }

1454 static void gl2psFreeImagemap(GL2PSimagemap *list)
1455 {
1456  GL2PSimagemap *next;
1457  while(list != NULL){
1458  next = list->next;
1459  gl2psFree(list->image->pixels);
1460  gl2psFree(list->image);
1461  gl2psFree(list);
1462  list = next;
1463  }
1464 }

1466 static void gl2psFreePrimitive(void *data)
1467 {
1468  GL2PSprimitive *q;
1469 
1470  q = *(GL2PSprimitive**)data;
1471  gl2psFree(q->verts);
1472  if(q->type == GL2PS_TEXT || q->type == GL2PS_SPECIAL){
1473  gl2psFreeText(q->data.text);
1474  }
1475  else if(q->type == GL2PS_PIXMAP){
1476  gl2psFreePixmap(q->data.image);
1477  }
1478  gl2psFree(q);
1479 }

1481 static void gl2psAddPrimitiveInList(GL2PSprimitive *prim, GL2PSlist *list)
1482 {
1483  GL2PSprimitive *t1, *t2;
1484 
1485  if(prim->type != GL2PS_QUADRANGLE){
1486  gl2psListAdd(list, &prim);
1487  }
1488  else{
1489  gl2psDivideQuad(prim, &t1, &t2);
1490  gl2psListAdd(list, &t1);
1491  gl2psListAdd(list, &t2);
1492  gl2psFreePrimitive(&prim);
1493  }
1494 
1495 }

1497 static void gl2psFreeBspTree(GL2PSbsptree **tree)
1498 {
1499  if(*tree){
1500  if((*tree)->back) gl2psFreeBspTree(&(*tree)->back);
1501  if((*tree)->primitives){
1502  gl2psListAction((*tree)->primitives, gl2psFreePrimitive);
1503  gl2psListDelete((*tree)->primitives);
1504  }
1505  if((*tree)->front) gl2psFreeBspTree(&(*tree)->front);
1506  gl2psFree(*tree);
1507  *tree = NULL;
1508  }
1509 }

1511 static GLboolean gl2psGreater(GLfloat f1, GLfloat f2)
1512 {
1513  if(f1 > f2) return GL_TRUE;
1514  else return GL_FALSE;
1515 }

1517 static GLboolean gl2psLess(GLfloat f1, GLfloat f2)
1518 {
1519  if(f1 < f2) return GL_TRUE;
1520  else return GL_FALSE;
1521 }
1522 
1523 static void gl2psBuildBspTree(GL2PSbsptree *tree, GL2PSlist *primitives)
1524 {
1525  GL2PSprimitive *prim, *frontprim = NULL, *backprim = NULL;
1526  GL2PSlist *frontlist, *backlist;
1527  GLint i, index;
1528 
1529  tree->front = NULL;
1530  tree->back = NULL;
1531  tree->primitives = gl2psListCreate(1, 2, sizeof(GL2PSprimitive*));
1532  index = gl2psFindRoot(primitives, &prim);
1533  gl2psGetPlane(prim, tree->plane);
1534  gl2psAddPrimitiveInList(prim, tree->primitives);
1535 
1536  frontlist = gl2psListCreate(1, 2, sizeof(GL2PSprimitive*));
1537  backlist = gl2psListCreate(1, 2, sizeof(GL2PSprimitive*));
1538 
1539  for(i = 0; i < gl2psListNbr(primitives); i++){
1540  if(i != index){
1541  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(primitives,i);
1542  switch(gl2psSplitPrimitive(prim, tree->plane, &frontprim, &backprim)){
1543  case GL2PS_COINCIDENT:
1544  gl2psAddPrimitiveInList(prim, tree->primitives);
1545  break;
1546  case GL2PS_IN_BACK_OF:
1547  gl2psAddPrimitiveInList(prim, backlist);
1548  break;
1549  case GL2PS_IN_FRONT_OF:
1550  gl2psAddPrimitiveInList(prim, frontlist);
1551  break;
1552  case GL2PS_SPANNING:
1553  gl2psAddPrimitiveInList(backprim, backlist);
1554  gl2psAddPrimitiveInList(frontprim, frontlist);
1555  gl2psFreePrimitive(&prim);
1556  break;
1557  }
1558  }
1559  }
1560 
1561  if(gl2psListNbr(tree->primitives)){
1562  gl2psListSort(tree->primitives, gl2psTrianglesFirst);
1563  }
1564 
1565  if(gl2psListNbr(frontlist)){
1566  gl2psListSort(frontlist, gl2psTrianglesFirst);
1567  tree->front = (GL2PSbsptree*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSbsptree));
1568  gl2psBuildBspTree(tree->front, frontlist);
1569  }
1570  else{
1571  gl2psListDelete(frontlist);
1572  }
1573 
1574  if(gl2psListNbr(backlist)){
1575  gl2psListSort(backlist, gl2psTrianglesFirst);
1576  tree->back = (GL2PSbsptree*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSbsptree));
1577  gl2psBuildBspTree(tree->back, backlist);
1578  }
1579  else{
1580  gl2psListDelete(backlist);
1581  }
1582 
1583  gl2psListDelete(primitives);
1584 }
1585 
1586 static void gl2psTraverseBspTree(GL2PSbsptree *tree, GL2PSxyz eye, GLfloat epsilon,
1587  GLboolean (*compare)(GLfloat f1, GLfloat f2),
1588  void (*action)(void *data), int inverse)
1589 {
1590  GLfloat result;
1591 
1592  if(!tree) return;
1593 
1594  result = gl2psComparePointPlane(eye, tree->plane);
1595 
1596  if(GL_TRUE == compare(result, epsilon)){
1597  gl2psTraverseBspTree(tree->back, eye, epsilon, compare, action, inverse);
1598  if(inverse){
1599  gl2psListActionInverse(tree->primitives, action);
1600  }
1601  else{
1602  gl2psListAction(tree->primitives, action);
1603  }
1604  gl2psTraverseBspTree(tree->front, eye, epsilon, compare, action, inverse);
1605  }
1606  else if(GL_TRUE == compare(-epsilon, result)){
1607  gl2psTraverseBspTree(tree->front, eye, epsilon, compare, action, inverse);
1608  if(inverse){
1609  gl2psListActionInverse(tree->primitives, action);
1610  }
1611  else{
1612  gl2psListAction(tree->primitives, action);
1613  }
1614  gl2psTraverseBspTree(tree->back, eye, epsilon, compare, action, inverse);
1615  }
1616  else{
1617  gl2psTraverseBspTree(tree->front, eye, epsilon, compare, action, inverse);
1618  gl2psTraverseBspTree(tree->back, eye, epsilon, compare, action, inverse);
1619  }
1620 }
1621 
1622 static void gl2psRescaleAndOffset(void)
1623 {
1624  GL2PSprimitive *prim;
1625  GLfloat minZ, maxZ, rangeZ, scaleZ;
1626  GLfloat factor, units, area, dZ, dZdX, dZdY, maxdZ;
1627  int i, j;
1628 
1629  if(!gl2psListNbr(gl2ps->primitives))
1630  return;
1631 
1632  /* get z-buffer range */
1633  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(gl2ps->primitives, 0);
1634  minZ = maxZ = prim->verts[0].xyz[2];
1635  for(i = 1; i < prim->numverts; i++){
1636  if(prim->verts[i].xyz[2] < minZ) minZ = prim->verts[i].xyz[2];
1637  if(prim->verts[i].xyz[2] > maxZ) maxZ = prim->verts[i].xyz[2];
1638  }
1639  for(i = 1; i < gl2psListNbr(gl2ps->primitives); i++){
1640  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(gl2ps->primitives, i);
1641  for(j = 0; j < prim->numverts; j++){
1642  if(prim->verts[j].xyz[2] < minZ) minZ = prim->verts[j].xyz[2];
1643  if(prim->verts[j].xyz[2] > maxZ) maxZ = prim->verts[j].xyz[2];
1644  }
1645  }
1646  rangeZ = (maxZ - minZ);
1647 
1648  /* rescale z-buffer coordinate in [0,GL2PS_ZSCALE], to make it of
1649  the same order of magnitude as the x and y coordinates */
1650  scaleZ = GL2PS_ZERO(rangeZ) ? GL2PS_ZSCALE : (GL2PS_ZSCALE / rangeZ);
1651  /* avoid precision loss (we use floats!) */
1652  if(scaleZ > 100000.F) scaleZ = 100000.F;
1653 
1654  /* apply offsets */
1655  for(i = 0; i < gl2psListNbr(gl2ps->primitives); i++){
1656  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(gl2ps->primitives, i);
1657  for(j = 0; j < prim->numverts; j++){
1658  prim->verts[j].xyz[2] = (prim->verts[j].xyz[2] - minZ) * scaleZ;
1659  }
1660  if((gl2ps->options & GL2PS_SIMPLE_LINE_OFFSET) &&
1661  (prim->type == GL2PS_LINE)){
1662  if(gl2ps->sort == GL2PS_SIMPLE_SORT){
1663  prim->verts[0].xyz[2] -= GL2PS_ZOFFSET_LARGE;
1664  prim->verts[1].xyz[2] -= GL2PS_ZOFFSET_LARGE;
1665  }
1666  else{
1667  prim->verts[0].xyz[2] -= GL2PS_ZOFFSET;
1668  prim->verts[1].xyz[2] -= GL2PS_ZOFFSET;
1669  }
1670  }
1671  else if(prim->offset && (prim->type == GL2PS_TRIANGLE)){
1672  factor = gl2ps->offset[0];
1673  units = gl2ps->offset[1];
1674  area =
1675  (prim->verts[1].xyz[0] - prim->verts[0].xyz[0]) *
1676  (prim->verts[2].xyz[1] - prim->verts[1].xyz[1]) -
1677  (prim->verts[2].xyz[0] - prim->verts[1].xyz[0]) *
1678  (prim->verts[1].xyz[1] - prim->verts[0].xyz[1]);
1679  if(!GL2PS_ZERO(area)){
1680  dZdX =
1681  ((prim->verts[2].xyz[1] - prim->verts[1].xyz[1]) *
1682  (prim->verts[1].xyz[2] - prim->verts[0].xyz[2]) -
1683  (prim->verts[1].xyz[1] - prim->verts[0].xyz[1]) *
1684  (prim->verts[2].xyz[2] - prim->verts[1].xyz[2])) / area;
1685  dZdY =
1686  ((prim->verts[1].xyz[0] - prim->verts[0].xyz[0]) *
1687  (prim->verts[2].xyz[2] - prim->verts[1].xyz[2]) -
1688  (prim->verts[2].xyz[0] - prim->verts[1].xyz[0]) *
1689  (prim->verts[1].xyz[2] - prim->verts[0].xyz[2])) / area;
1690  maxdZ = (GLfloat)sqrt(dZdX * dZdX + dZdY * dZdY);
1691  }
1692  else{
1693  maxdZ = 0.0F;
1694  }
1695  dZ = factor * maxdZ + units;
1696  prim->verts[0].xyz[2] += dZ;
1697  prim->verts[1].xyz[2] += dZ;
1698  prim->verts[2].xyz[2] += dZ;
1699  }
1700  }
1701 }
1702 
1703 /*********************************************************************
1704  *
1705  * 2D sorting routines (for occlusion culling)
1706  *
1707  *********************************************************************/
1708 
1709 static GLint gl2psGetPlaneFromPoints(GL2PSxyz a, GL2PSxyz b, GL2PSplane plane)
1710 {
1711  GLfloat n;
1712 
1713  plane[0] = b[1] - a[1];
1714  plane[1] = a[0] - b[0];
1715  n = (GLfloat)sqrt(plane[0]*plane[0] + plane[1]*plane[1]);
1716  plane[2] = 0.0F;
1717  if(!GL2PS_ZERO(n)){
1718  plane[0] /= n;
1719  plane[1] /= n;
1720  plane[3] = -plane[0]*a[0]-plane[1]*a[1];
1721  return 1;
1722  }
1723  else{
1724  plane[0] = -1.0F;
1725  plane[1] = 0.0F;
1726  plane[3] = a[0];
1727  return 0;
1728  }
1729 }
1730 
1731 static void gl2psFreeBspImageTree(GL2PSbsptree2d **tree)
1732 {
1733  if(*tree){
1734  if((*tree)->back) gl2psFreeBspImageTree(&(*tree)->back);
1735  if((*tree)->front) gl2psFreeBspImageTree(&(*tree)->front);
1736  gl2psFree(*tree);
1737  *tree = NULL;
1738  }
1739 }
1740 
1741 static GLint gl2psCheckPoint(GL2PSxyz point, GL2PSplane plane)
1742 {
1743  GLfloat pt_dis;
1744 
1745  pt_dis = gl2psComparePointPlane(point, plane);
1746  if(pt_dis > GL2PS_EPSILON) return GL2PS_POINT_INFRONT;
1747  else if(pt_dis < -GL2PS_EPSILON) return GL2PS_POINT_BACK;
1748  else return GL2PS_POINT_COINCIDENT;
1749 }
1750 
1751 static void gl2psAddPlanesInBspTreeImage(GL2PSprimitive *prim,
1752  GL2PSbsptree2d **tree)
1753 {
1754  GLint ret = 0;
1755  GLint i;
1756  GLint offset = 0;
1757  GL2PSbsptree2d *head = NULL, *cur = NULL;
1758 
1759  if((*tree == NULL) && (prim->numverts > 2)){
1760  /* don't cull if transparent
1761  for(i = 0; i < prim->numverts - 1; i++)
1762  if(prim->verts[i].rgba[3] < 1.0F) return;
1763  */
1764  head = (GL2PSbsptree2d*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSbsptree2d));
1765  for(i = 0; i < prim->numverts-1; i++){
1766  if(!gl2psGetPlaneFromPoints(prim->verts[i].xyz,
1767  prim->verts[i+1].xyz,
1768  head->plane)){
1769  if(prim->numverts-i > 3){
1770  offset++;
1771  }
1772  else{
1773  gl2psFree(head);
1774  return;
1775  }
1776  }
1777  else{
1778  break;
1779  }
1780  }
1781  head->back = NULL;
1782  head->front = NULL;
1783  for(i = 2+offset; i < prim->numverts; i++){
1784  ret = gl2psCheckPoint(prim->verts[i].xyz, head->plane);
1785  if(ret != GL2PS_POINT_COINCIDENT) break;
1786  }
1787  switch(ret){
1788  case GL2PS_POINT_INFRONT :
1789  cur = head;
1790  for(i = 1+offset; i < prim->numverts-1; i++){
1791  if(cur->front == NULL){
1792  cur->front = (GL2PSbsptree2d*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSbsptree2d));
1793  }
1794  if(gl2psGetPlaneFromPoints(prim->verts[i].xyz,
1795  prim->verts[i+1].xyz,
1796  cur->front->plane)){
1797  cur = cur->front;
1798  cur->front = NULL;
1799  cur->back = NULL;
1800  }
1801  }
1802  if(cur->front == NULL){
1803  cur->front = (GL2PSbsptree2d*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSbsptree2d));
1804  }
1805  if(gl2psGetPlaneFromPoints(prim->verts[i].xyz,
1806  prim->verts[offset].xyz,
1807  cur->front->plane)){
1808  cur->front->front = NULL;
1809  cur->front->back = NULL;
1810  }
1811  else{
1812  gl2psFree(cur->front);
1813  cur->front = NULL;
1814  }
1815  break;
1816  case GL2PS_POINT_BACK :
1817  for(i = 0; i < 4; i++){
1818  head->plane[i] = -head->plane[i];
1819  }
1820  cur = head;
1821  for(i = 1+offset; i < prim->numverts-1; i++){
1822  if(cur->front == NULL){
1823  cur->front = (GL2PSbsptree2d*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSbsptree2d));
1824  }
1825  if(gl2psGetPlaneFromPoints(prim->verts[i+1].xyz,
1826  prim->verts[i].xyz,
1827  cur->front->plane)){
1828  cur = cur->front;
1829  cur->front = NULL;
1830  cur->back = NULL;
1831  }
1832  }
1833  if(cur->front == NULL){
1834  cur->front = (GL2PSbsptree2d*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSbsptree2d));
1835  }
1836  if(gl2psGetPlaneFromPoints(prim->verts[offset].xyz,
1837  prim->verts[i].xyz,
1838  cur->front->plane)){
1839  cur->front->front = NULL;
1840  cur->front->back = NULL;
1841  }
1842  else{
1843  gl2psFree(cur->front);
1844  cur->front = NULL;
1845  }
1846  break;
1847  default:
1848  gl2psFree(head);
1849  return;
1850  }
1851  (*tree) = head;
1852  }
1853 }
1854 
1855 static GLint gl2psCheckPrimitive(GL2PSprimitive *prim, GL2PSplane plane)
1856 {
1857  GLint i;
1858  GLint pos;
1859 
1860  pos = gl2psCheckPoint(prim->verts[0].xyz, plane);
1861  for(i = 1; i < prim->numverts; i++){
1862  pos |= gl2psCheckPoint(prim->verts[i].xyz, plane);
1863  if(pos == (GL2PS_POINT_INFRONT | GL2PS_POINT_BACK)) return GL2PS_SPANNING;
1864  }
1865  if(pos & GL2PS_POINT_INFRONT) return GL2PS_IN_FRONT_OF;
1866  else if(pos & GL2PS_POINT_BACK) return GL2PS_IN_BACK_OF;
1867  else return GL2PS_COINCIDENT;
1868 }
1869 
1870 static GL2PSprimitive *gl2psCreateSplitPrimitive2D(GL2PSprimitive *parent,
1871  GLshort numverts,
1872  GL2PSvertex *vertx)
1873 {
1874  GLint i;
1875  GL2PSprimitive *child = (GL2PSprimitive*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSprimitive));
1876 
1877  if(parent->type == GL2PS_IMAGEMAP){
1878  child->type = GL2PS_IMAGEMAP;
1879  child->data.image = parent->data.image;
1880  }
1881  else {
1882  switch(numverts){
1883  case 1 : child->type = GL2PS_POINT; break;
1884  case 2 : child->type = GL2PS_LINE; break;
1885  case 3 : child->type = GL2PS_TRIANGLE; break;
1886  case 4 : child->type = GL2PS_QUADRANGLE; break;
1887  default: child->type = GL2PS_NO_TYPE; break; /* FIXME */
1888  }
1889  }
1890  child->boundary = 0; /* FIXME: not done! */
1891  child->culled = parent->culled;
1892  child->offset = parent->offset;
1893  child->pattern = parent->pattern;
1894  child->factor = parent->factor;
1895  child->width = parent->width;
1896  child->numverts = numverts;
1897  child->verts = (GL2PSvertex*)gl2psMalloc(numverts * sizeof(GL2PSvertex));
1898  for(i = 0; i < numverts; i++){
1899  child->verts[i] = vertx[i];
1900  }
1901  return child;
1902 }
1903 
1904 static void gl2psSplitPrimitive2D(GL2PSprimitive *prim,
1905  GL2PSplane plane,
1906  GL2PSprimitive **front,
1907  GL2PSprimitive **back)
1908 {
1909  /* cur will hold the position of the current vertex
1910  prev will hold the position of the previous vertex
1911  prev0 will hold the position of the vertex number 0
1912  v1 and v2 represent the current and previous vertices, respectively
1913  flag is set if the current vertex should be checked against the plane */
1914  GLint cur = -1, prev = -1, i, v1 = 0, v2 = 0, flag = 1, prev0 = -1;
1915 
1916  /* list of vertices that will go in front and back primitive */
1917  GL2PSvertex *front_list = NULL, *back_list = NULL;
1918 
1919  /* number of vertices in front and back list */
1920  GLshort front_count = 0, back_count = 0;
1921 
1922  for(i = 0; i <= prim->numverts; i++){
1923  v1 = i;
1924  if(v1 == prim->numverts){
1925  if(prim->numverts < 3) break;
1926  v1 = 0;
1927  v2 = prim->numverts - 1;
1928  cur = prev0;
1929  }
1930  else if(flag){
1931  cur = gl2psCheckPoint(prim->verts[v1].xyz, plane);
1932  if(i == 0){
1933  prev0 = cur;
1934  }
1935  }
1936  if(((prev == -1) || (prev == cur) || (prev == 0) || (cur == 0)) &&
1937  (i < prim->numverts)){
1938  if(cur == GL2PS_POINT_INFRONT){
1939  front_count++;
1940  front_list = (GL2PSvertex*)gl2psRealloc(front_list,
1941  sizeof(GL2PSvertex)*front_count);
1942  front_list[front_count-1] = prim->verts[v1];
1943  }
1944  else if(cur == GL2PS_POINT_BACK){
1945  back_count++;
1946  back_list = (GL2PSvertex*)gl2psRealloc(back_list,
1947  sizeof(GL2PSvertex)*back_count);
1948  back_list[back_count-1] = prim->verts[v1];
1949  }
1950  else{
1951  front_count++;
1952  front_list = (GL2PSvertex*)gl2psRealloc(front_list,
1953  sizeof(GL2PSvertex)*front_count);
1954  front_list[front_count-1] = prim->verts[v1];
1955  back_count++;
1956  back_list = (GL2PSvertex*)gl2psRealloc(back_list,
1957  sizeof(GL2PSvertex)*back_count);
1958  back_list[back_count-1] = prim->verts[v1];
1959  }
1960  flag = 1;
1961  }
1962  else if((prev != cur) && (cur != 0) && (prev != 0)){
1963  if(v1 != 0){
1964  v2 = v1-1;
1965  i--;
1966  }
1967  front_count++;
1968  front_list = (GL2PSvertex*)gl2psRealloc(front_list,
1969  sizeof(GL2PSvertex)*front_count);
1970  gl2psCutEdge(&prim->verts[v2], &prim->verts[v1],
1971  plane, &front_list[front_count-1]);
1972  back_count++;
1973  back_list = (GL2PSvertex*)gl2psRealloc(back_list,
1974  sizeof(GL2PSvertex)*back_count);
1975  back_list[back_count-1] = front_list[front_count-1];
1976  flag = 0;
1977  }
1978  prev = cur;
1979  }
1980  *front = gl2psCreateSplitPrimitive2D(prim, front_count, front_list);
1981  *back = gl2psCreateSplitPrimitive2D(prim, back_count, back_list);
1982  gl2psFree(front_list);
1983  gl2psFree(back_list);
1984 }
1985 
1986 static GLint gl2psAddInBspImageTree(GL2PSprimitive *prim, GL2PSbsptree2d **tree)
1987 {
1988  GLint ret = 0;
1989  GL2PSprimitive *frontprim = NULL, *backprim = NULL;
1990 
1991  /* FIXME: until we consider the actual extent of text strings and
1992  pixmaps, never cull them. Otherwise the whole string/pixmap gets
1993  culled as soon as the reference point is hidden */
1994  if(prim->type == GL2PS_PIXMAP ||
1995  prim->type == GL2PS_TEXT ||
1996  prim->type == GL2PS_SPECIAL){
1997  return 1;
1998  }
1999 
2000  if(*tree == NULL){
2001  if((prim->type != GL2PS_IMAGEMAP) && (GL_FALSE == gl2ps->zerosurfacearea)){
2002  gl2psAddPlanesInBspTreeImage(gl2ps->primitivetoadd, tree);
2003  }
2004  return 1;
2005  }
2006  else{
2007  switch(gl2psCheckPrimitive(prim, (*tree)->plane)){
2008  case GL2PS_IN_BACK_OF: return gl2psAddInBspImageTree(prim, &(*tree)->back);
2009  case GL2PS_IN_FRONT_OF:
2010  if((*tree)->front != NULL) return gl2psAddInBspImageTree(prim, &(*tree)->front);
2011  else return 0;
2012  case GL2PS_SPANNING:
2013  gl2psSplitPrimitive2D(prim, (*tree)->plane, &frontprim, &backprim);
2014  ret = gl2psAddInBspImageTree(backprim, &(*tree)->back);
2015  if((*tree)->front != NULL){
2016  if(gl2psAddInBspImageTree(frontprim, &(*tree)->front)){
2017  ret = 1;
2018  }
2019  }
2020  gl2psFree(frontprim->verts);
2021  gl2psFree(frontprim);
2022  gl2psFree(backprim->verts);
2023  gl2psFree(backprim);
2024  return ret;
2025  case GL2PS_COINCIDENT:
2026  if((*tree)->back != NULL){
2027  gl2ps->zerosurfacearea = GL_TRUE;
2028  ret = gl2psAddInBspImageTree(prim, &(*tree)->back);
2029  gl2ps->zerosurfacearea = GL_FALSE;
2030  if(ret) return ret;
2031  }
2032  if((*tree)->front != NULL){
2033  gl2ps->zerosurfacearea = GL_TRUE;
2034  ret = gl2psAddInBspImageTree(prim, &(*tree)->front);
2035  gl2ps->zerosurfacearea = GL_FALSE;
2036  if(ret) return ret;
2037  }
2038  if(prim->type == GL2PS_LINE) return 1;
2039  else return 0;
2040  }
2041  }
2042  return 0;
2043 }
2044 
2045 static void gl2psAddInImageTree(void *data)
2046 {
2047  GL2PSprimitive *prim = *(GL2PSprimitive **)data;
2048  gl2ps->primitivetoadd = prim;
2049  if(prim->type == GL2PS_IMAGEMAP && prim->data.image->format == GL2PS_IMAGEMAP_VISIBLE){
2050  prim->culled = 1;
2051  }
2052  else if(!gl2psAddInBspImageTree(prim, &gl2ps->imagetree)){
2053  prim->culled = 1;
2054  }
2055  else if(prim->type == GL2PS_IMAGEMAP){
2056  prim->data.image->format = GL2PS_IMAGEMAP_VISIBLE;
2057  }
2058 }

2061 
2062 static void gl2psAddBoundaryInList(GL2PSprimitive *prim, GL2PSlist *list)
2063 {
2064  GL2PSprimitive *b;
2065  GLshort i;
2066  GL2PSxyz c;
2067 
2068  c[0] = c[1] = c[2] = 0.0F;
2069  for(i = 0; i < prim->numverts; i++){
2070  c[0] += prim->verts[i].xyz[0];
2071  c[1] += prim->verts[i].xyz[1];
2072  }
2073  c[0] /= prim->numverts;
2074  c[1] /= prim->numverts;
2075 
2076  for(i = 0; i < prim->numverts; i++){
2077  if(prim->boundary & (GLint)pow(2., i)){
2078  b = (GL2PSprimitive*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSprimitive));
2079  b->type = GL2PS_LINE;
2080  b->offset = prim->offset;
2081  b->pattern = prim->pattern;
2082  b->factor = prim->factor;
2083  b->culled = prim->culled;
2084  b->width = prim->width;
2085  b->boundary = 0;
2086  b->numverts = 2;
2087  b->verts = (GL2PSvertex*)gl2psMalloc(2 * sizeof(GL2PSvertex));
2088 
2089 #if 0 /* FIXME: need to work on boundary offset... */
2090  v[0] = c[0] - prim->verts[i].xyz[0];
2091  v[1] = c[1] - prim->verts[i].xyz[1];
2092  v[2] = 0.0F;
2093  norm = gl2psNorm(v);
2094  v[0] /= norm;
2095  v[1] /= norm;
2096  b->verts[0].xyz[0] = prim->verts[i].xyz[0] +0.1*v[0];
2097  b->verts[0].xyz[1] = prim->verts[i].xyz[1] +0.1*v[1];
2098  b->verts[0].xyz[2] = prim->verts[i].xyz[2];
2099  v[0] = c[0] - prim->verts[gl2psGetIndex(i, prim->numverts)].xyz[0];
2100  v[1] = c[1] - prim->verts[gl2psGetIndex(i, prim->numverts)].xyz[1];
2101  norm = gl2psNorm(v);
2102  v[0] /= norm;
2103  v[1] /= norm;
2104  b->verts[1].xyz[0] = prim->verts[gl2psGetIndex(i, prim->numverts)].xyz[0] +0.1*v[0];
2105  b->verts[1].xyz[1] = prim->verts[gl2psGetIndex(i, prim->numverts)].xyz[1] +0.1*v[1];
2106  b->verts[1].xyz[2] = prim->verts[gl2psGetIndex(i, prim->numverts)].xyz[2];
2107 #else
2108  b->verts[0].xyz[0] = prim->verts[i].xyz[0];
2109  b->verts[0].xyz[1] = prim->verts[i].xyz[1];
2110  b->verts[0].xyz[2] = prim->verts[i].xyz[2];
2111  b->verts[1].xyz[0] = prim->verts[gl2psGetIndex(i, prim->numverts)].xyz[0];
2112  b->verts[1].xyz[1] = prim->verts[gl2psGetIndex(i, prim->numverts)].xyz[1];
2113  b->verts[1].xyz[2] = prim->verts[gl2psGetIndex(i, prim->numverts)].xyz[2];
2114 #endif
2115 
2116  b->verts[0].rgba[0] = 0.0F;
2117  b->verts[0].rgba[1] = 0.0F;
2118  b->verts[0].rgba[2] = 0.0F;
2119  b->verts[0].rgba[3] = 0.0F;
2120  b->verts[1].rgba[0] = 0.0F;
2121  b->verts[1].rgba[1] = 0.0F;
2122  b->verts[1].rgba[2] = 0.0F;
2123  b->verts[1].rgba[3] = 0.0F;
2124  gl2psListAdd(list, &b);
2125  }
2126  }
2127 
2128 }

2130 static void gl2psBuildPolygonBoundary(GL2PSbsptree *tree)
2131 {
2132  GLint i;
2133  GL2PSprimitive *prim;
2134 
2135  if(!tree) return;
2136  gl2psBuildPolygonBoundary(tree->back);
2137  for(i = 0; i < gl2psListNbr(tree->primitives); i++){
2138  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(tree->primitives, i);
2139  if(prim->boundary) gl2psAddBoundaryInList(prim, tree->primitives);
2140  }
2141  gl2psBuildPolygonBoundary(tree->front);
2142 }

2150 static void gl2psAddPolyPrimitive(GLshort type, GLshort numverts,
2151  GL2PSvertex *verts, GLint offset,
2152  GLushort pattern, GLint factor,
2153  GLfloat width, char boundary)
2154 {
2155  GL2PSprimitive *prim;
2156 
2157  prim = (GL2PSprimitive*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSprimitive));
2158  prim->type = type;
2159  prim->numverts = numverts;
2160  prim->verts = (GL2PSvertex*)gl2psMalloc(numverts * sizeof(GL2PSvertex));
2161  memcpy(prim->verts, verts, numverts * sizeof(GL2PSvertex));
2162  prim->boundary = boundary;

2164  prim->pattern = pattern;
2165  prim->factor = factor;

2167  prim->culled = 0;
2168

2170  tris/quads to enhance SIMPLE_SORT */
2171
