2174 
2175 static GLint gl2psGetVertex(GL2PSvertex *v, GLfloat *p)
2176 {
2177  GLint i;
2178 
2179  v->xyz[0] = p[0];
2180  v->xyz[1] = p[1];
2181  v->xyz[2] = p[2];
2182 
2183  if(gl2ps->colormode == GL_COLOR_INDEX && gl2ps->colorsize > 0){
2184  i = (GLint)(p[3] + 0.5);
2185  v->rgba[0] = gl2ps->colormap[i][0];
2186  v->rgba[1] = gl2ps->colormap[i][1];
2187  v->rgba[2] = gl2ps->colormap[i][2];
2188  v->rgba[3] = gl2ps->colormap[i][3];
2189  return 4;
2190  }
2191  else{
2192  v->rgba[0] = p[3];
2193  v->rgba[1] = p[4];
2194  v->rgba[2] = p[5];
2195  v->rgba[3] = p[6];
2196  return 7;
2197  }
2198 }
2199 
2200 static void gl2psParseFeedbackBuffer(GLint used)
2201 {
2202  char flag;
2203  GLushort pattern = 0;
2204  GLboolean boundary;
2205  GLint i, sizeoffloat, count, v, vtot, offset = 0, factor = 0, auxindex = 0;
2206  GLfloat lwidth = 1.0F, psize = 1.0F;
2207  GLfloat *current;
2208  GL2PSvertex vertices[3];
2209  GL2PSprimitive *prim;
2210  GL2PSimagemap *node;
2211 
2212  current = gl2ps->feedback;
2213  boundary = gl2ps->boundary = GL_FALSE;
2214 
2215  while(used > 0){
2216 
2217  if(GL_TRUE == boundary) gl2ps->boundary = GL_TRUE;
2218 
2219  switch((GLint)*current){
2220  case GL_POINT_TOKEN :
2221  current ++;
2222  used --;
2223  i = gl2psGetVertex(&vertices[0], current);
2224  current += i;
2225  used -= i;
2226  gl2psAddPolyPrimitive(GL2PS_POINT, 1, vertices, 0,
2227  pattern, factor, psize, 0);
2228  break;
2229  case GL_LINE_TOKEN :
2230  case GL_LINE_RESET_TOKEN :
2231  current ++;
2232  used --;
2233  i = gl2psGetVertex(&vertices[0], current);
2234  current += i;
2235  used -= i;
2236  i = gl2psGetVertex(&vertices[1], current);
2237  current += i;
2238  used -= i;
2239  gl2psAddPolyPrimitive(GL2PS_LINE, 2, vertices, 0,
2240  pattern, factor, lwidth, 0);
2241  break;
2242  case GL_POLYGON_TOKEN :
2243  count = (GLint)current[1];
2244  current += 2;
2245  used -= 2;
2246  v = vtot = 0;
2247  while(count > 0 && used > 0){
2248  i = gl2psGetVertex(&vertices[v], current);
2249  gl2psAdaptVertexForBlending(&vertices[v]);
2250  current += i;
2251  used -= i;
2252  count --;
2253  vtot++;
2254  if(v == 2){
2255  if(GL_TRUE == boundary){
2256  if(!count && vtot == 2) flag = 1|2|4;
2257  else if(!count) flag = 2|4;
2258  else if(vtot == 2) flag = 1|2;
2259  else flag = 2;
2260  }
2261  else
2262  flag = 0;
2263  gl2psAddPolyPrimitive(GL2PS_TRIANGLE, 3, vertices, offset,
2264  pattern, factor, 1, flag);
2265  vertices[1] = vertices[2];
2266  }
2267  else
2268  v ++;
2269  }
2270  break;
2271  case GL_BITMAP_TOKEN :
2272  case GL_DRAW_PIXEL_TOKEN :
2273  case GL_COPY_PIXEL_TOKEN :
2274  current ++;
2275  used --;
2276  i = gl2psGetVertex(&vertices[0], current);
2277  current += i;
2278  used -= i;
2279  break;
2280  case GL_PASS_THROUGH_TOKEN :
2281  switch((GLint)current[1]){
2282  case GL2PS_BEGIN_OFFSET_TOKEN : offset = 1; break;
2283  case GL2PS_END_OFFSET_TOKEN : offset = 0; break;
2284  case GL2PS_BEGIN_BOUNDARY_TOKEN : boundary = GL_TRUE; break;
2285  case GL2PS_END_BOUNDARY_TOKEN : boundary = GL_FALSE; break;
2286  case GL2PS_END_STIPPLE_TOKEN : pattern = factor = 0; break;
2287  case GL2PS_BEGIN_BLEND_TOKEN : gl2ps->blending = GL_TRUE; break;
2288  case GL2PS_END_BLEND_TOKEN : gl2ps->blending = GL_FALSE; break;
2289  case GL2PS_BEGIN_STIPPLE_TOKEN :
2290  current += 2;
2291  used -= 2;
2292  pattern = (GLushort)current[1];
2293  current += 2;
2294  used -= 2;
2295  factor = (GLint)current[1];
2296  break;
2297  case GL2PS_SRC_BLEND_TOKEN :
2298  current += 2;
2299  used -= 2;
2300  gl2ps->blendfunc[0] = (GLint)current[1];
2301  break;
2302  case GL2PS_DST_BLEND_TOKEN :
2303  current += 2;
2304  used -= 2;
2305  gl2ps->blendfunc[1] = (GLint)current[1];
2306  break;
2307  case GL2PS_POINT_SIZE_TOKEN :
2308  current += 2;
2309  used -= 2;
2310  psize = current[1];
2311  break;
2312  case GL2PS_LINE_WIDTH_TOKEN :
2313  current += 2;
2314  used -= 2;
2315  lwidth = current[1];
2316  break;
2317  case GL2PS_IMAGEMAP_TOKEN :
2318  prim = (GL2PSprimitive *)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSprimitive));
2319  prim->type = GL2PS_IMAGEMAP;
2320  prim->boundary = 0;
2321  prim->numverts = 4;
2322  prim->verts = (GL2PSvertex *)gl2psMalloc(4 * sizeof(GL2PSvertex));
2323  prim->culled = 0;
2324  prim->offset = 0;
2325  prim->pattern = 0;
2326  prim->factor = 0;
2327  prim->width = 1;
2328 
2329  node = (GL2PSimagemap*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSimagemap));
2330  node->image = (GL2PSimage*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSimage));
2331  node->image->type = 0;
2332  node->image->format = 0;
2333  node->image->zoom_x = 1.0F;
2334  node->image->zoom_y = 1.0F;
2335  node->next = NULL;
2336 
2337  if(gl2ps->imagemap_head == NULL)
2338  gl2ps->imagemap_head = node;
2339  else
2340  gl2ps->imagemap_tail->next = node;
2341  gl2ps->imagemap_tail = node;
2342  prim->data.image = node->image;
2343 
2344  current += 2; used -= 2;
2345  i = gl2psGetVertex(&prim->verts[0], &current[1]);
2346  current += i; used -= i;
2347 
2348  node->image->width = (GLint)current[2];
2349  current += 2; used -= 2;
2350  node->image->height = (GLint)current[2];
2351  prim->verts[0].xyz[0] = prim->verts[0].xyz[0] - (int)(node->image->width / 2) + 0.5F;
2352  prim->verts[0].xyz[1] = prim->verts[0].xyz[1] - (int)(node->image->height / 2) + 0.5F;
2353  for(i = 1; i < 4; i++){
2354  for(v = 0; v < 3; v++){
2355  prim->verts[i].xyz[v] = prim->verts[0].xyz[v];
2356  prim->verts[i].rgba[v] = prim->verts[0].rgba[v];
2357  }
2358  prim->verts[i].rgba[v] = prim->verts[0].rgba[v];
2359  }
2360  prim->verts[1].xyz[0] = prim->verts[1].xyz[0] + node->image->width;
2361  prim->verts[2].xyz[0] = prim->verts[1].xyz[0];
2362  prim->verts[2].xyz[1] = prim->verts[2].xyz[1] + node->image->height;
2363  prim->verts[3].xyz[1] = prim->verts[2].xyz[1];
2364 
2365  sizeoffloat = sizeof(GLfloat);
2366  v = 2 * sizeoffloat;
2367  vtot = node->image->height + node->image->height *
2368  ((node->image->width - 1) / 8);
2369  node->image->pixels = (GLfloat*)gl2psMalloc(v + vtot);
2370  node->image->pixels[0] = prim->verts[0].xyz[0];
2371  node->image->pixels[1] = prim->verts[0].xyz[1];
2372 
2373  for(i = 0; i < vtot; i += sizeoffloat){
2374  current += 2; used -= 2;
2375  if((vtot - i) >= 4)
2376  memcpy(&(((char*)(node->image->pixels))[i + v]), &(current[2]), sizeoffloat);
2377  else
2378  memcpy(&(((char*)(node->image->pixels))[i + v]), &(current[2]), vtot - i);
2379  }
2380  current++; used--;
2381  gl2psListAdd(gl2ps->primitives, &prim);
2382  break;
2383  case GL2PS_DRAW_PIXELS_TOKEN :
2384  case GL2PS_TEXT_TOKEN :
2385  if(auxindex < gl2psListNbr(gl2ps->auxprimitives))
2386  gl2psListAdd(gl2ps->primitives,
2387  gl2psListPointer(gl2ps->auxprimitives, auxindex++));
2388  else
2389  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Wrong number of auxiliary tokens in buffer");
2390  break;
2391  }
2392  current += 2;
2393  used -= 2;
2394  break;
2395  default :
2396  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_WARNING, "Unknown token in buffer");
2397  current ++;
2398  used --;
2399  break;
2400  }
2401  }
2402 
2403  gl2psListReset(gl2ps->auxprimitives);
2404 }
2405 
2406 /*********************************************************************
2407  *
2408  * PostScript routines
2409  *
2410  *********************************************************************/
2411 
2412 static void gl2psWriteByte(unsigned char byte)
2413 {
2414  unsigned char h = byte / 16;
2415  unsigned char l = byte % 16;
2416  gl2psPrintf("%x%x", h, l);
2417 }
2418 
2419 static void gl2psPrintPostScriptPixmap(GLfloat x, GLfloat y, GL2PSimage *im)
2420 {
2421  GLuint nbhex, nbyte, nrgb, nbits;
2422  GLuint row, col, ibyte, icase;
2423  GLfloat dr, dg, db, fgrey;
2424  unsigned char red = 0, green = 0, blue = 0, b, grey;
2425  GLuint width = (GLuint)im->width;
2426  GLuint height = (GLuint)im->height;
2427 
2428  /* FIXME: should we define an option for these? Or just keep the
2429  8-bit per component case? */
2430  int greyscale = 0; /* set to 1 to output greyscale image */
2431  int nbit = 8; /* number of bits per color compoment (2, 4 or 8) */
2432 
2433  if((width <= 0) || (height <= 0)) return;
2434 
2435  gl2psPrintf("gsave\n");
2436  gl2psPrintf("%.2f %.2f translate\n", x, y);
2437  gl2psPrintf("%.2f %.2f scale\n", width * im->zoom_x, height * im->zoom_y);
2438 
2439  if(greyscale){ /* greyscale */
2440  gl2psPrintf("/picstr %d string def\n", width);
2441  gl2psPrintf("%d %d %d\n", width, height, 8);
2442  gl2psPrintf("[ %d 0 0 -%d 0 %d ]\n", width, height, height);
2443  gl2psPrintf("{ currentfile picstr readhexstring pop }\n");
2444  gl2psPrintf("image\n");
2445  for(row = 0; row < height; row++){
2446  for(col = 0; col < width; col++){
2447  gl2psGetRGB(im, col, row, &dr, &dg, &db);
2448  fgrey = (0.30F * dr + 0.59F * dg + 0.11F * db);
2449  grey = (unsigned char)(255. * fgrey);
2450  gl2psWriteByte(grey);
2451  }
2452  gl2psPrintf("\n");
2453  }
2454  nbhex = width * height * 2;
2455  gl2psPrintf("%%%% nbhex digit :%d\n", nbhex);
2456  }
2457  else if(nbit == 2){ /* color, 2 bits for r and g and b; rgbs following each other */
2458  nrgb = width * 3;
2459  nbits = nrgb * nbit;
2460  nbyte = nbits / 8;
2461  if((nbyte * 8) != nbits) nbyte++;
2462  gl2psPrintf("/rgbstr %d string def\n", nbyte);
2463  gl2psPrintf("%d %d %d\n", width, height, nbit);
2464  gl2psPrintf("[ %d 0 0 -%d 0 %d ]\n", width, height, height);
2465  gl2psPrintf("{ currentfile rgbstr readhexstring pop }\n");
2466  gl2psPrintf("false 3\n");
2467  gl2psPrintf("colorimage\n");
2468  for(row = 0; row < height; row++){
2469  icase = 1;
2470  col = 0;
2471  b = 0;
2472  for(ibyte = 0; ibyte < nbyte; ibyte++){
2473  if(icase == 1) {
2474  if(col < width) {
2475  gl2psGetRGB(im, col, row, &dr, &dg, &db);
2476  }
2477  else {
2478  dr = dg = db = 0;
2479  }
2480  col++;
2481  red = (unsigned char)(3. * dr);
2482  green = (unsigned char)(3. * dg);
2483  blue = (unsigned char)(3. * db);
2484  b = red;
2485  b = (b<<2) + green;
2486  b = (b<<2) + blue;
2487  if(col < width) {
2488  gl2psGetRGB(im, col, row, &dr, &dg, &db);
2489  }
2490  else {
2491  dr = dg = db = 0;
2492  }
2493  col++;
2494  red = (unsigned char)(3. * dr);
2495  green = (unsigned char)(3. * dg);
2496  blue = (unsigned char)(3. * db);
2497  b = (b<<2) + red;
2498  gl2psWriteByte(b);
2499  b = 0;
2500  icase++;
2501  }
2502  else if(icase == 2) {
2503  b = green;
2504  b = (b<<2) + blue;
2505  if(col < width) {
2506  gl2psGetRGB(im, col, row, &dr, &dg, &db);
2507  }
2508  else {
2509  dr = dg = db = 0;
2510  }
2511  col++;
2512  red = (unsigned char)(3. * dr);
2513  green = (unsigned char)(3. * dg);
2514  blue = (unsigned char)(3. * db);
2515  b = (b<<2) + red;
2516  b = (b<<2) + green;
2517  gl2psWriteByte(b);
2518  b = 0;
2519  icase++;
2520  }
2521  else if(icase == 3) {
2522  b = blue;
2523  if(col < width) {
2524  gl2psGetRGB(im, col, row, &dr, &dg, &db);
2525  }
2526  else {
2527  dr = dg = db = 0;
2528  }
2529  col++;
2530  red = (unsigned char)(3. * dr);
2531  green = (unsigned char)(3. * dg);
2532  blue = (unsigned char)(3. * db);
2533  b = (b<<2) + red;
2534  b = (b<<2) + green;
2535  b = (b<<2) + blue;
2536  gl2psWriteByte(b);
2537  b = 0;
2538  icase = 1;
2539  }
2540  }
2541  gl2psPrintf("\n");
2542  }
2543  }
2544  else if(nbit == 4){ /* color, 4 bits for r and g and b; rgbs following each other */
2545  nrgb = width * 3;
2546  nbits = nrgb * nbit;
2547  nbyte = nbits / 8;
2548  if((nbyte * 8) != nbits) nbyte++;
2549  gl2psPrintf("/rgbstr %d string def\n", nbyte);
2550  gl2psPrintf("%d %d %d\n", width, height, nbit);
2551  gl2psPrintf("[ %d 0 0 -%d 0 %d ]\n", width, height, height);
2552  gl2psPrintf("{ currentfile rgbstr readhexstring pop }\n");
2553  gl2psPrintf("false 3\n");
2554  gl2psPrintf("colorimage\n");
2555  for(row = 0; row < height; row++){
2556  col = 0;
2557  icase = 1;
2558  for(ibyte = 0; ibyte < nbyte; ibyte++){
2559  if(icase == 1) {
2560  if(col < width) {
2561  gl2psGetRGB(im, col, row, &dr, &dg, &db);
2562  }
2563  else {
2564  dr = dg = db = 0;
2565  }
2566  col++;
2567  red = (unsigned char)(15. * dr);
2568  green = (unsigned char)(15. * dg);
2569  gl2psPrintf("%x%x", red, green);
2570  icase++;
2571  }
2572  else if(icase == 2) {
2573  blue = (unsigned char)(15. * db);
2574  if(col < width) {
2575  gl2psGetRGB(im, col, row, &dr, &dg, &db);
2576  }
2577  else {
2578  dr = dg = db = 0;
2579  }
2580  col++;
2581  red = (unsigned char)(15. * dr);
2582  gl2psPrintf("%x%x", blue, red);
2583  icase++;
2584  }
2585  else if(icase == 3) {
2586  green = (unsigned char)(15. * dg);
2587  blue = (unsigned char)(15. * db);
2588  gl2psPrintf("%x%x", green, blue);
2589  icase = 1;
2590  }
2591  }
2592  gl2psPrintf("\n");
2593  }
2594  }
2595  else{ /* 8 bit for r and g and b */
2596  nbyte = width * 3;
2597  gl2psPrintf("/rgbstr %d string def\n", nbyte);
2598  gl2psPrintf("%d %d %d\n", width, height, 8);
2599  gl2psPrintf("[ %d 0 0 -%d 0 %d ]\n", width, height, height);
2600  gl2psPrintf("{ currentfile rgbstr readhexstring pop }\n");
2601  gl2psPrintf("false 3\n");
2602  gl2psPrintf("colorimage\n");
2603  for(row = 0; row < height; row++){
2604  for(col = 0; col < width; col++){
2605  gl2psGetRGB(im, col, row, &dr, &dg, &db);
2606  red = (unsigned char)(255. * dr);
2607  gl2psWriteByte(red);
2608  green = (unsigned char)(255. * dg);
2609  gl2psWriteByte(green);
2610  blue = (unsigned char)(255. * db);
2611  gl2psWriteByte(blue);
2612  }
2613  gl2psPrintf("\n");
2614  }
2615  }
2616 
2617  gl2psPrintf("grestore\n");
2618 }
2619 
2620 static void gl2psPrintPostScriptImagemap(GLfloat x, GLfloat y,
2621  GLsizei width, GLsizei height,
2622  const unsigned char *imagemap){
2623  int i, size;
2624 
2625  if((width <= 0) || (height <= 0)) return;
2626 
2627  size = height + height * (width - 1) / 8;
2628 
2629  gl2psPrintf("gsave\n");
2630  gl2psPrintf("%.2f %.2f translate\n", x, y);
2631  gl2psPrintf("%d %d scale\n%d %d\ntrue\n", width, height,width, height);
2632  gl2psPrintf("[ %d 0 0 -%d 0 %d ] {<", width, height);
2633  for(i = 0; i < size; i++){
2634  gl2psWriteByte(*imagemap);
2635  imagemap++;
2636  }
2637  gl2psPrintf(">} imagemask\ngrestore\n");
2638 }
2639 
2640 static void gl2psPrintPostScriptHeader(void)
2641 {
2642  time_t now;
2643 
2644  /* Since compression is not part of the PostScript standard,
2645  compressed PostScript files are just gzipped PostScript files
2646  ("ps.gz" or "eps.gz") */
2647  gl2psPrintGzipHeader();
2648 
2649  time(&now);
2650 
2651  if(gl2ps->format == GL2PS_PS){
2652  gl2psPrintf("%%!PS-Adobe-3.0\n");
2653  }
2654  else{
2655  gl2psPrintf("%%!PS-Adobe-3.0 EPSF-3.0\n");
2656  }
2657 
2658  gl2psPrintf("%%%%Title: %s\n"
2659  "%%%%Creator: GL2PS %d.%d.%d%s, %s\n"
2660  "%%%%For: %s\n"
2661  "%%%%CreationDate: %s"
2662  "%%%%LanguageLevel: 3\n"
2663  "%%%%DocumentData: Clean7Bit\n"
2664  "%%%%Pages: 1\n",
2665  gl2ps->title, GL2PS_MAJOR_VERSION, GL2PS_MINOR_VERSION,
2666  GL2PS_PATCH_VERSION, GL2PS_EXTRA_VERSION, GL2PS_COPYRIGHT,
2667  gl2ps->producer, ctime(&now));
2668 
2669  if(gl2ps->format == GL2PS_PS){
2670  gl2psPrintf("%%%%Orientation: %s\n"
2671  "%%%%DocumentMedia: Default %d %d 0 () ()\n",
2672  (gl2ps->options & GL2PS_LANDSCAPE) ? "Landscape" : "Portrait",
2673  (gl2ps->options & GL2PS_LANDSCAPE) ? (int)gl2ps->viewport[3] :
2674  (int)gl2ps->viewport[2],
2675  (gl2ps->options & GL2PS_LANDSCAPE) ? (int)gl2ps->viewport[2] :
2676  (int)gl2ps->viewport[3]);
2677  }
2678 
2679  gl2psPrintf("%%%%BoundingBox: %d %d %d %d\n"
2680  "%%%%EndComments\n",
2681  (gl2ps->options & GL2PS_LANDSCAPE) ? (int)gl2ps->viewport[1] :
2682  (int)gl2ps->viewport[0],
2683  (gl2ps->options & GL2PS_LANDSCAPE) ? (int)gl2ps->viewport[0] :
2684  (int)gl2ps->viewport[1],
2685  (gl2ps->options & GL2PS_LANDSCAPE) ? (int)gl2ps->viewport[3] :
2686  (int)gl2ps->viewport[2],
2687  (gl2ps->options & GL2PS_LANDSCAPE) ? (int)gl2ps->viewport[2] :
2688  (int)gl2ps->viewport[3]);
2689 
2690  /* RGB color: r g b C (replace C by G in output to change from rgb to gray)
2691  Grayscale: r g b G
2692  Font choose: size fontname FC
2693  Text string: (string) x y size fontname S??
2694  Rotated text string: (string) angle x y size fontname S??R
2695  Point primitive: x y size P
2696  Line width: width W
2697  Line start: x y LS
2698  Line joining last point: x y L
2699  Line end: x y LE
2700  Flat-shaded triangle: x3 y3 x2 y2 x1 y1 T
2701  Smooth-shaded triangle: x3 y3 r3 g3 b3 x2 y2 r2 g2 b2 x1 y1 r1 g1 b1 ST */
2702 
2703  gl2psPrintf("%%%%BeginProlog\n"
2704  "/gl2psdict 64 dict def gl2psdict begin\n"
2705  "0 setlinecap 0 setlinejoin\n"
2706  "/tryPS3shading %s def %% set to false to force subdivision\n"
2707  "/rThreshold %g def %% red component subdivision threshold\n"
2708  "/gThreshold %g def %% green component subdivision threshold\n"
2709  "/bThreshold %g def %% blue component subdivision threshold\n",
2710  (gl2ps->options & GL2PS_NO_PS3_SHADING) ? "false" : "true",
2711  gl2ps->threshold[0], gl2ps->threshold[1], gl2ps->threshold[2]);
2712 
2713  gl2psPrintf("/BD { bind def } bind def\n"
2714  "/C { setrgbcolor } BD\n"
2715  "/G { 0.082 mul exch 0.6094 mul add exch 0.3086 mul add neg 1.0 add setgray } BD\n"
2716  "/W { setlinewidth } BD\n");
2717 
2718  gl2psPrintf("/FC { findfont exch /SH exch def SH scalefont setfont } BD\n"
2719  "/SW { dup stringwidth pop } BD\n"
2720  "/S { FC moveto show } BD\n"
2721  "/SBC{ FC moveto SW -2 div 0 rmoveto show } BD\n"
2722  "/SBR{ FC moveto SW neg 0 rmoveto show } BD\n"
2723  "/SCL{ FC moveto 0 SH -2 div rmoveto show } BD\n"
2724  "/SCC{ FC moveto SW -2 div SH -2 div rmoveto show } BD\n"
2725  "/SCR{ FC moveto SW neg SH -2 div rmoveto show } BD\n"
2726  "/STL{ FC moveto 0 SH neg rmoveto show } BD\n"
2727  "/STC{ FC moveto SW -2 div SH neg rmoveto show } BD\n"
2728  "/STR{ FC moveto SW neg SH neg rmoveto show } BD\n");
2729 
2730  /* rotated text routines: same nameanem with R appended */
2731 
2732  gl2psPrintf("/FCT { FC translate 0 0 } BD\n"
2733  "/SR { gsave FCT moveto rotate show grestore } BD\n"
2734  "/SBCR{ gsave FCT moveto rotate SW -2 div 0 rmoveto show grestore } BD\n"
2735  "/SBRR{ gsave FCT moveto rotate SW neg 0 rmoveto show grestore } BD\n"
2736  "/SCLR{ gsave FCT moveto rotate 0 SH -2 div rmoveto show grestore} BD\n");
2737  gl2psPrintf("/SCCR{ gsave FCT moveto rotate SW -2 div SH -2 div rmoveto show grestore} BD\n"
2738  "/SCRR{ gsave FCT moveto rotate SW neg SH -2 div rmoveto show grestore} BD\n"
2739  "/STLR{ gsave FCT moveto rotate 0 SH neg rmoveto show grestore } BD\n"
2740  "/STCR{ gsave FCT moveto rotate SW -2 div SH neg rmoveto show grestore } BD\n"
2741  "/STRR{ gsave FCT moveto rotate SW neg SH neg rmoveto show grestore } BD\n");
2742 
2743  gl2psPrintf("/P { newpath 0.0 360.0 arc closepath fill } BD\n"
2744  "/LS { newpath moveto } BD\n"
2745  "/L { lineto } BD\n"
2746  "/LE { lineto stroke } BD\n"
2747  "/T { newpath moveto lineto lineto closepath fill } BD\n");
2748 
2749  /* Smooth-shaded triangle with PostScript level 3 shfill operator:
2750  x3 y3 r3 g3 b3 x2 y2 r2 g2 b2 x1 y1 r1 g1 b1 STshfill */
2751 
2752  gl2psPrintf("/STshfill {\n"
2753  " /b1 exch def /g1 exch def /r1 exch def /y1 exch def /x1 exch def\n"
2754  " /b2 exch def /g2 exch def /r2 exch def /y2 exch def /x2 exch def\n"
2755  " /b3 exch def /g3 exch def /r3 exch def /y3 exch def /x3 exch def\n"
2756  " gsave << /ShadingType 4 /ColorSpace [/DeviceRGB]\n"
2757  " /DataSource [ 0 x1 y1 r1 g1 b1 0 x2 y2 r2 g2 b2 0 x3 y3 r3 g3 b3 ] >>\n"
2758  " shfill grestore } BD\n");
2759 
2760  /* Flat-shaded triangle with middle color:
2761  x3 y3 r3 g3 b3 x2 y2 r2 g2 b2 x1 y1 r1 g1 b1 Tm */
2762 
2763  gl2psPrintf(/* stack : x3 y3 r3 g3 b3 x2 y2 r2 g2 b2 x1 y1 r1 g1 b1 */
2764  "/Tm { 3 -1 roll 8 -1 roll 13 -1 roll add add 3 div\n" /* r = (r1+r2+r3)/3 */
2765  /* stack : x3 y3 g3 b3 x2 y2 g2 b2 x1 y1 g1 b1 r */
2766  " 3 -1 roll 7 -1 roll 11 -1 roll add add 3 div\n" /* g = (g1+g2+g3)/3 */
2767  /* stack : x3 y3 b3 x2 y2 b2 x1 y1 b1 r g b */
2768  " 3 -1 roll 6 -1 roll 9 -1 roll add add 3 div" /* b = (b1+b2+b3)/3 */
2769  /* stack : x3 y3 x2 y2 x1 y1 r g b */
2770  " C T } BD\n");
2771 
2772  /* Split triangle in four sub-triangles (at sides middle points) and call the
2773  STnoshfill procedure on each, interpolating the colors in RGB space:
2774  x3 y3 r3 g3 b3 x2 y2 r2 g2 b2 x1 y1 r1 g1 b1 STsplit
2775  (in procedure comments key: (Vi) = xi yi ri gi bi) */
2776 
2777  gl2psPrintf("/STsplit {\n"
2778  " 4 index 15 index add 0.5 mul\n" /* x13 = (x1+x3)/2 */
2779  " 4 index 15 index add 0.5 mul\n" /* y13 = (y1+y3)/2 */
2780  " 4 index 15 index add 0.5 mul\n" /* r13 = (r1+r3)/2 */
2781  " 4 index 15 index add 0.5 mul\n" /* g13 = (g1+g3)/2 */
2782  " 4 index 15 index add 0.5 mul\n" /* b13 = (b1+b3)/2 */
2783  " 5 copy 5 copy 25 15 roll\n");
2784 
2785  /* at his point, stack = (V3) (V13) (V13) (V13) (V2) (V1) */
2786 
2787  gl2psPrintf(" 9 index 30 index add 0.5 mul\n" /* x23 = (x2+x3)/2 */
2788  " 9 index 30 index add 0.5 mul\n" /* y23 = (y2+y3)/2 */
2789  " 9 index 30 index add 0.5 mul\n" /* r23 = (r2+r3)/2 */
2790  " 9 index 30 index add 0.5 mul\n" /* g23 = (g2+g3)/2 */
2791  " 9 index 30 index add 0.5 mul\n" /* b23 = (b2+b3)/2 */
2792  " 5 copy 5 copy 35 5 roll 25 5 roll 15 5 roll\n");
2793 
2794  /* stack = (V3) (V13) (V23) (V13) (V23) (V13) (V23) (V2) (V1) */
2795 
2796  gl2psPrintf(" 4 index 10 index add 0.5 mul\n" /* x12 = (x1+x2)/2 */
2797  " 4 index 10 index add 0.5 mul\n" /* y12 = (y1+y2)/2 */
2798  " 4 index 10 index add 0.5 mul\n" /* r12 = (r1+r2)/2 */
2799  " 4 index 10 index add 0.5 mul\n" /* g12 = (g1+g2)/2 */
2800  " 4 index 10 index add 0.5 mul\n" /* b12 = (b1+b2)/2 */
2801  " 5 copy 5 copy 40 5 roll 25 5 roll 15 5 roll 25 5 roll\n");
2802 
2803  /* stack = (V3) (V13) (V23) (V13) (V12) (V23) (V13) (V1) (V12) (V23) (V12) (V2) */
2804 
2805  gl2psPrintf(" STnoshfill STnoshfill STnoshfill STnoshfill } BD\n");
2806 
2807  /* Gouraud shaded triangle using recursive subdivision until the difference
2808  between corner colors does not exceed the thresholds:
2809  x3 y3 r3 g3 b3 x2 y2 r2 g2 b2 x1 y1 r1 g1 b1 STnoshfill */
2810 
2811  gl2psPrintf("/STnoshfill {\n"
2812  " 2 index 8 index sub abs rThreshold gt\n" /* |r1-r2|>rth */
2813  " { STsplit }\n"
2814  " { 1 index 7 index sub abs gThreshold gt\n" /* |g1-g2|>gth */
2815  " { STsplit }\n"
2816  " { dup 6 index sub abs bThreshold gt\n" /* |b1-b2|>bth */
2817  " { STsplit }\n"
2818  " { 2 index 13 index sub abs rThreshold gt\n" /* |r1-r3|>rht */
2819  " { STsplit }\n"
2820  " { 1 index 12 index sub abs gThreshold gt\n" /* |g1-g3|>gth */
2821  " { STsplit }\n"
2822  " { dup 11 index sub abs bThreshold gt\n" /* |b1-b3|>bth */
2823  " { STsplit }\n"
2824  " { 7 index 13 index sub abs rThreshold gt\n"); /* |r2-r3|>rht */
2825  gl2psPrintf(" { STsplit }\n"
2826  " { 6 index 12 index sub abs gThreshold gt\n" /* |g2-g3|>gth */
2827  " { STsplit }\n"
2828  " { 5 index 11 index sub abs bThreshold gt\n" /* |b2-b3|>bth */
2829  " { STsplit }\n"
2830  " { Tm }\n" /* all colors sufficiently similar */
2831  " ifelse }\n"
2832  " ifelse }\n"
2833  " ifelse }\n"
2834  " ifelse }\n"
2835  " ifelse }\n"
2836  " ifelse }\n"
2837  " ifelse }\n"
2838  " ifelse }\n"
2839  " ifelse } BD\n");
2840 
2841  gl2psPrintf("tryPS3shading\n"
2842  "{ /shfill where\n"
2843  " { /ST { STshfill } BD }\n"
2844  " { /ST { STnoshfill } BD }\n"
2845  " ifelse }\n"
2846  "{ /ST { STnoshfill } BD }\n"
2847  "ifelse\n");
2848 
2849  gl2psPrintf("end\n"
2850  "%%%%EndProlog\n"
2851  "%%%%BeginSetup\n"
2852  "/DeviceRGB setcolorspace\n"
2853  "gl2psdict begin\n"
2854  "%%%%EndSetup\n"
2855  "%%%%Page: 1 1\n"
2856  "%%%%BeginPageSetup\n");
2857 
2858  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_LANDSCAPE){
2859  gl2psPrintf("%d 0 translate 90 rotate\n",
2860  (int)gl2ps->viewport[3]);
2861  }
2862 
2863  gl2psPrintf("%%%%EndPageSetup\n"
2864  "mark\n"
2865  "gsave\n"
2866  "1.0 1.0 scale\n");
2867 
2868  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_DRAW_BACKGROUND){
2869  gl2psPrintf("%g %g %g C\n"
2870  "newpath %d %d moveto %d %d lineto %d %d lineto %d %d lineto\n"
2871  "closepath fill\n",
2872  gl2ps->bgcolor[0], gl2ps->bgcolor[1], gl2ps->bgcolor[2],
2873  (int)gl2ps->viewport[0], (int)gl2ps->viewport[1], (int)gl2ps->viewport[2],
2874  (int)gl2ps->viewport[1], (int)gl2ps->viewport[2], (int)gl2ps->viewport[3],
2875  (int)gl2ps->viewport[0], (int)gl2ps->viewport[3]);
2876  }
2877 }

2880 {
2881  if(!gl2psSameColor(gl2ps->lastrgba, rgba)){
2882  gl2psSetLastColor(rgba);
2883  gl2psPrintf("%g %g %g C\n", rgba[0], rgba[1], rgba[2]);
2884  }

2887 static void gl2psResetPostScriptColor(void)
2888 {

2892 static void gl2psEndPostScriptLine(void)
2893 {
2894  int i;
2895  if(gl2ps->lastvertex.rgba[0] >= 0.){
2896  gl2psPrintf("%g %g LE\n", gl2ps->lastvertex.xyz[0], gl2ps->lastvertex.xyz[1]);
2897  for(i = 0; i < 3; i++)
2898  gl2ps->lastvertex.xyz[i] = -1.;
2899  for(i = 0; i < 4; i++)
2900  gl2ps->lastvertex.rgba[i] = -1.;
2901  }
2902 }
2903 
2904 static void gl2psParseStipplePattern(GLushort pattern, GLint factor,
2905  int *nb, int array[10])
2906 {
2907  int i, n;
2908  int on[8] = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0};
2909  int off[8] = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0};
2910  char tmp[16];
2911 
2912  /* extract the 16 bits from the OpenGL stipple pattern */
2913  for(n = 15; n >= 0; n--){
2914  tmp[n] = (char)(pattern & 0x01);
2915  pattern >>= 1;
2916  }
2917  /* compute the on/off pixel sequence */
2918  n = 0;
2919  for(i = 0; i < 8; i++){
2920  while(n < 16 && !tmp[n]){ off[i]++; n++; }
2921  while(n < 16 && tmp[n]){ on[i]++; n++; }
2922  if(n >= 15){ i++; break; }
2923  }
2924 
2925  /* store the on/off array from right to left, starting with off
2926  pixels. The PostScript specification allows for at most 11
2927  elements in the on/off array, so we limit ourselves to 5 on/off
2928  couples (our longest possible array is thus [on4 off4 on3 off3
2929  on2 off2 on1 off1 on0 off0]) */
2930  *nb = 0;
2931  for(n = i - 1; n >= 0; n--){
2932  array[(*nb)++] = factor * on[n];
2933  array[(*nb)++] = factor * off[n];
2934  if(*nb == 10) break;
2935  }
2936 }
2937 
2938 static int gl2psPrintPostScriptDash(GLushort pattern, GLint factor, const char *str)
2939 {
2940  int len = 0, i, n, array[10];
2941 
2942  if(pattern == gl2ps->lastpattern && factor == gl2ps->lastfactor)
2943  return 0;
2944 
2945  gl2ps->lastpattern = pattern;
2946  gl2ps->lastfactor = factor;
2947 
2948  if(!pattern || !factor){
2949  /* solid line */
2950  len += gl2psPrintf("[] 0 %s\n", str);
2951  }
2952  else{
2953  gl2psParseStipplePattern(pattern, factor, &n, array);
2954  len += gl2psPrintf("[");
2955  for(i = 0; i < n; i++){
2956  if(i) len += gl2psPrintf(" ");
2957  len += gl2psPrintf("%d", array[i]);
2958  }
2959  len += gl2psPrintf("] 0 %s\n", str);
2960  }
2961 
2962  return len;
2963 }
2964 
2965 static void gl2psPrintPostScriptPrimitive(void *data)
2966 {
2967  int newline;
2968  GL2PSprimitive *prim;
2969 
2970  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)data;
2971 
2972  if((gl2ps->options & GL2PS_OCCLUSION_CULL) && prim->culled) return;
2973 
2974  /* Every effort is made to draw lines as connected segments (i.e.,
2975  using a single PostScript path): this is the only way to get nice
2976  line joins and to not restart the stippling for every line
2977  segment. So if the primitive to print is not a line we must first
2978  finish the current line (if any): */
2979  if(prim->type != GL2PS_LINE) gl2psEndPostScriptLine();
2980 
2981  switch(prim->type){
2982  case GL2PS_POINT :
2983  gl2psPrintPostScriptColor(prim->verts[0].rgba);
2984  gl2psPrintf("%g %g %g P\n",
2985  prim->verts[0].xyz[0], prim->verts[0].xyz[1], 0.5 * prim->width);
2986  break;
2987  case GL2PS_LINE :
2988  if(!gl2psSamePosition(gl2ps->lastvertex.xyz, prim->verts[0].xyz) ||
2989  !gl2psSameColor(gl2ps->lastrgba, prim->verts[0].rgba) ||
2990  gl2ps->lastlinewidth != prim->width ||
2991  gl2ps->lastpattern != prim->pattern ||
2992  gl2ps->lastfactor != prim->factor){
2993  /* End the current line if the new segment does not start where
2994  the last one ended, or if the color, the width or the
2995  stippling have changed (multi-stroking lines with changing
2996  colors is necessary until we use /shfill for lines;
2997  unfortunately this means that at the moment we can screw up
2998  line stippling for smooth-shaded lines) */
2999  gl2psEndPostScriptLine();
3000  newline = 1;
3001  }
3002  else{
3003  newline = 0;
3004  }
3005  if(gl2ps->lastlinewidth != prim->width){
3006  gl2ps->lastlinewidth = prim->width;
3007  gl2psPrintf("%g W\n", gl2ps->lastlinewidth);
3008  }
3009  gl2psPrintPostScriptDash(prim->pattern, prim->factor, "setdash");
3010  gl2psPrintPostScriptColor(prim->verts[0].rgba);
3011  gl2psPrintf("%g %g %s\n", prim->verts[0].xyz[0], prim->verts[0].xyz[1],
3012  newline ? "LS" : "L");
3013  gl2ps->lastvertex = prim->verts[1];
3014  break;
3015  case GL2PS_TRIANGLE :
3016  if(!gl2psVertsSameColor(prim)){
3017  gl2psResetPostScriptColor();
3018  gl2psPrintf("%g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g ST\n",
3019  prim->verts[2].xyz[0], prim->verts[2].xyz[1],
3020  prim->verts[2].rgba[0], prim->verts[2].rgba[1],
3021  prim->verts[2].rgba[2], prim->verts[1].xyz[0],
3022  prim->verts[1].xyz[1], prim->verts[1].rgba[0],
3023  prim->verts[1].rgba[1], prim->verts[1].rgba[2],
3024  prim->verts[0].xyz[0], prim->verts[0].xyz[1],
3025  prim->verts[0].rgba[0], prim->verts[0].rgba[1],
3026  prim->verts[0].rgba[2]);
3027  }
3028  else{
3029  gl2psPrintPostScriptColor(prim->verts[0].rgba);
3030  gl2psPrintf("%g %g %g %g %g %g T\n",
3031  prim->verts[2].xyz[0], prim->verts[2].xyz[1],
3032  prim->verts[1].xyz[0], prim->verts[1].xyz[1],
3033  prim->verts[0].xyz[0], prim->verts[0].xyz[1]);
3034  }
3035  break;
3036  case GL2PS_QUADRANGLE :
3037  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_WARNING, "There should not be any quad left to print");
3038  break;
3039  case GL2PS_PIXMAP :
3040  gl2psPrintPostScriptPixmap(prim->verts[0].xyz[0], prim->verts[0].xyz[1],
3041  prim->data.image);
3042  break;
3043  case GL2PS_IMAGEMAP :
3044  if(prim->data.image->type != GL2PS_IMAGEMAP_WRITTEN){
3045  gl2psPrintPostScriptColor(prim->verts[0].rgba);
3046  gl2psPrintPostScriptImagemap(prim->data.image->pixels[0],
3047  prim->data.image->pixels[1],
3048  prim->data.image->width, prim->data.image->height,
3049  (const unsigned char*)(&(prim->data.image->pixels[2])));
3050  prim->data.image->type = GL2PS_IMAGEMAP_WRITTEN;
3051  }
3052  break;
3053  case GL2PS_TEXT :
3054  gl2psPrintPostScriptColor(prim->verts[0].rgba);
3055  gl2psPrintf("(%s) ", prim->data.text->str);
3056  if(prim->data.text->angle)
3057  gl2psPrintf("%g ", prim->data.text->angle);
3058  gl2psPrintf("%g %g %d /%s ",
3059  prim->verts[0].xyz[0], prim->verts[0].xyz[1],
3060  prim->data.text->fontsize, prim->data.text->fontname);
3061  switch(prim->data.text->alignment){
3062  case GL2PS_TEXT_C:
3063  gl2psPrintf(prim->data.text->angle ? "SCCR\n" : "SCC\n");
3064  break;
3065  case GL2PS_TEXT_CL:
3066  gl2psPrintf(prim->data.text->angle ? "SCLR\n" : "SCL\n");
3067  break;
3068  case GL2PS_TEXT_CR:
3069  gl2psPrintf(prim->data.text->angle ? "SCRR\n" : "SCR\n");
3070  break;
3071  case GL2PS_TEXT_B:
3072  gl2psPrintf(prim->data.text->angle ? "SBCR\n" : "SBC\n");
3073  break;
3074  case GL2PS_TEXT_BR:
3075  gl2psPrintf(prim->data.text->angle ? "SBRR\n" : "SBR\n");
3076  break;
3077  case GL2PS_TEXT_T:
3078  gl2psPrintf(prim->data.text->angle ? "STCR\n" : "STC\n");
3079  break;
3080  case GL2PS_TEXT_TL:
3081  gl2psPrintf(prim->data.text->angle ? "STLR\n" : "STL\n");
3082  break;
3083  case GL2PS_TEXT_TR:
3084  gl2psPrintf(prim->data.text->angle ? "STRR\n" : "STR\n");
3085  break;
3086  case GL2PS_TEXT_BL:
3087  default:
3088  gl2psPrintf(prim->data.text->angle ? "SR\n" : "S\n");
3089  break;
3090  }
3091  break;
3092  case GL2PS_SPECIAL :
3093  /* alignment contains the format for which the special output text
3094  is intended */
3095  if(prim->data.text->alignment == GL2PS_PS ||
3096  prim->data.text->alignment == GL2PS_EPS)
3097  gl2psPrintf("%s\n", prim->data.text->str);
3098  break;
3099  default :
3100  break;
3101  }
3102 }

3117 static void gl2psPrintPostScriptBeginViewport(GLint viewport[4])
3118 {
3119  GLint index;
3120  GLfloat rgba[4];

3122

3140  rgba[1] = gl2ps->colormap[index][1];
3141  rgba[2] = gl2ps->colormap[index][2];

3148  x, y, x+w, y, x+w, y+h, x, y+h);
3149  }
3150

3152  "closepath clip\n",
3153  x, y, x+w, y, x+w, y+h, x, y+h);
3154 
3155 }

3202 static void gl2psPrintTeXHeader(void)
3203 {
3204  char name[256];
3205  time_t now;
3206  int i;
3207 
3208  if(gl2ps->filename && strlen(gl2ps->filename) < 256){
3209  for(i = (int)strlen(gl2ps->filename) - 1; i >= 0; i--){
3210  if(gl2ps->filename[i] == '.'){
3211  strncpy(name, gl2ps->filename, i);
3212  name[i] = '\0';
3213  break;
3214  }
3215  }
3216  if(i <= 0) strcpy(name, gl2ps->filename);
3217  }
3218  else{
3219  strcpy(name, "untitled");
3220  }
3221 
3222  time(&now);
3223 
3224  fprintf(gl2ps->stream,
3225  "%% Title: %s\n"
3226  "%% Creator: GL2PS %d.%d.%d%s, %s\n"
3227  "%% For: %s\n"

3229  gl2ps->title, GL2PS_MAJOR_VERSION, GL2PS_MINOR_VERSION,
3230  GL2PS_PATCH_VERSION, GL2PS_EXTRA_VERSION, GL2PS_COPYRIGHT,
3231  gl2ps->producer, ctime(&now));
3232 
3233  fprintf(gl2ps->stream,
3234  "\\setlength{\\unitlength}{1pt}\n"
3235  "\\begin{picture}(0,0)\n"
3236  "\\includegraphics{%s}\n"
3237  "\\end{picture}%%\n"
3238  "%s\\begin{picture}(%d,%d)(0,0)\n",
3239  name, (gl2ps->options & GL2PS_LANDSCAPE) ? "\\rotatebox{90}{" : "",
3240  (int)gl2ps->viewport[2], (int)gl2ps->viewport[3]);
3241 }

3404 static void gl2psPutPDFText(GL2PSstring *text, int cnt, GLfloat x, GLfloat y)
3405 {
3406  GLfloat rad, crad, srad;
3407 
3408  if(text->angle == 0.0F){
3409  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintf
3410  ("BT\n"
3411  "/F%d %d Tf\n"
3412  "%f %f Td\n"
3413  "(%s) Tj\n"
3414  "ET\n",
3415  cnt, text->fontsize, x, y, text->str);
3416  }
3417  else{
3418  rad = (GLfloat)(M_PI * text->angle / 180.0F);
3419  srad = (GLfloat)sin(rad);
3420  crad = (GLfloat)cos(rad);
3421  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintf
3422  ("BT\n"
3423  "/F%d %d Tf\n"
3424  "%f %f %f %f %f %f Tm\n"
3425  "(%s) Tj\n"
3426  "ET\n",
3427  cnt, text->fontsize, crad, srad, -srad, crad, x, y, text->str);
3428  }
3429 }
3430 
3431 static void gl2psPutPDFImage(GL2PSimage *image, int cnt, GLfloat x, GLfloat y)
3432 {
3433  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintf
3434  ("q\n"
3435  "%d 0 0 %d %f %f cm\n"
3436  "/Im%d Do\n"
3437  "Q\n",
3438  (int)image->width, (int)image->height, x, y, cnt);
3439 }

3441 static void gl2psPDFstacksInit(void)
3442 {
3443  gl2ps->objects_stack = 7 /* FIXED_XREF_ENTRIES */ + 1;
3444  gl2ps->extgs_stack = 0;
3445  gl2ps->font_stack = 0;
3446  gl2ps->im_stack = 0;
3447  gl2ps->trgroupobjects_stack = 0;
3448  gl2ps->shader_stack = 0;
3449  gl2ps->mshader_stack = 0;
3450 }
3451 
3452 static void gl2psPDFgroupObjectInit(GL2PSpdfgroup *gro)
3453 {
3454  if(!gro)
3455  return;
3456 
3457  gro->ptrlist = NULL;
3458  gro->fontno = gro->gsno = gro->imno = gro->maskshno = gro->shno
3459  = gro->trgroupno = gro->fontobjno = gro->imobjno = gro->shobjno
3460  = gro->maskshobjno = gro->gsobjno = gro->trgroupobjno = -1;
3461 }
3462 
3463 /* Build up group objects and assign name and object numbers */
3464 
3465 static void gl2psPDFgroupListInit(void)
3466 {
3467  int i;
3468  GL2PSprimitive *p = NULL;
3469  GL2PSpdfgroup gro;
3470  int lasttype = GL2PS_NO_TYPE;
3471  GL2PSrgba lastrgba = {-1.0F, -1.0F, -1.0F, -1.0F};
3472  GLushort lastpattern = 0;
3473  GLint lastfactor = 0;
3474  GLfloat lastwidth = 1;
3475  GL2PStriangle lastt, tmpt;
3476  int lastTriangleWasNotSimpleWithSameColor = 0;
3477 
3478  if(!gl2ps->pdfprimlist)
3479  return;
3480 
3481  gl2ps->pdfgrouplist = gl2psListCreate(500, 500, sizeof(GL2PSpdfgroup));
3482  gl2psInitTriangle(&lastt);
3483 
3484  for(i = 0; i < gl2psListNbr(gl2ps->pdfprimlist); ++i){
3485  p = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(gl2ps->pdfprimlist, i);
3486  switch(p->type){
3487  case GL2PS_PIXMAP:
3488  gl2psPDFgroupObjectInit(&gro);
3489  gro.ptrlist = gl2psListCreate(1, 2, sizeof(GL2PSprimitive*));
3490  gro.imno = gl2ps->im_stack++;
3491  gl2psListAdd(gro.ptrlist, &p);
3492  gl2psListAdd(gl2ps->pdfgrouplist, &gro);
3493  break;
3494  case GL2PS_TEXT:
3495  gl2psPDFgroupObjectInit(&gro);
3496  gro.ptrlist = gl2psListCreate(1, 2, sizeof(GL2PSprimitive*));
3497  gro.fontno = gl2ps->font_stack++;
3498  gl2psListAdd(gro.ptrlist, &p);
3499  gl2psListAdd(gl2ps->pdfgrouplist, &gro);
3500  break;
3501  case GL2PS_LINE:
3502  if(lasttype != p->type || lastwidth != p->width ||
3503  lastpattern != p->pattern || lastfactor != p->factor ||
3504  !gl2psSameColor(p->verts[0].rgba, lastrgba)){
3505  gl2psPDFgroupObjectInit(&gro);
3506  gro.ptrlist = gl2psListCreate(1, 2, sizeof(GL2PSprimitive*));
3507  gl2psListAdd(gro.ptrlist, &p);
3508  gl2psListAdd(gl2ps->pdfgrouplist, &gro);
3509  }
3510  else{
3511  gl2psListAdd(gro.ptrlist, &p);
3512  }
3513  lastpattern = p->pattern;
3514  lastfactor = p->factor;
3515  lastwidth = p->width;
3516  lastrgba[0] = p->verts[0].rgba[0];
3517  lastrgba[1] = p->verts[0].rgba[1];
3518  lastrgba[2] = p->verts[0].rgba[2];
3519  break;
3520  case GL2PS_POINT:
3521  if(lasttype != p->type || lastwidth != p->width ||
3522  !gl2psSameColor(p->verts[0].rgba, lastrgba)){
3523  gl2psPDFgroupObjectInit(&gro);
3524  gro.ptrlist = gl2psListCreate(1,2,sizeof(GL2PSprimitive*));
3525  gl2psListAdd(gro.ptrlist, &p);
3526  gl2psListAdd(gl2ps->pdfgrouplist, &gro);
3527  }
3528  else{
3529  gl2psListAdd(gro.ptrlist, &p);
3530  }
3531  lastwidth = p->width;
3532  lastrgba[0] = p->verts[0].rgba[0];
3533  lastrgba[1] = p->verts[0].rgba[1];
3534  lastrgba[2] = p->verts[0].rgba[2];
3535  break;
3536  case GL2PS_TRIANGLE:
3537  gl2psFillTriangleFromPrimitive(&tmpt, p, GL_TRUE);
3538  lastTriangleWasNotSimpleWithSameColor =
3539  !(tmpt.prop & T_CONST_COLOR && tmpt.prop & T_ALPHA_1) ||
3540  !gl2psSameColor(tmpt.vertex[0].rgba, lastt.vertex[0].rgba);
3541  if(lasttype == p->type && tmpt.prop == lastt.prop &&
3542  lastTriangleWasNotSimpleWithSameColor){
3543  /* TODO Check here for last alpha */
3544  gl2psListAdd(gro.ptrlist, &p);
3545  }
3546  else{
3547  gl2psPDFgroupObjectInit(&gro);
3548  gro.ptrlist = gl2psListCreate(1, 2, sizeof(GL2PSprimitive*));
3549  gl2psListAdd(gro.ptrlist, &p);
3550  gl2psListAdd(gl2ps->pdfgrouplist, &gro);
3551  }
3552  lastt = tmpt;
3553  break;
3554  default:
3555  break;
3556  }
3557  lasttype = p->type;
3558  }
3559 }
3560 
3561 static void gl2psSortOutTrianglePDFgroup(GL2PSpdfgroup *gro)
3562 {
3563  GL2PStriangle t;
3564  GL2PSprimitive *prim = NULL;
3565 
3566  if(!gro)
3567  return;
3568 
3569  if(!gl2psListNbr(gro->ptrlist))
3570  return;
3571 
3572  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(gro->ptrlist, 0);
3573 
3574  if(prim->type != GL2PS_TRIANGLE)
3575  return;
3576 
3577  gl2psFillTriangleFromPrimitive(&t, prim, GL_TRUE);
3578 
3579  if(t.prop & T_CONST_COLOR && t.prop & T_ALPHA_LESS_1){
3580  gro->gsno = gl2ps->extgs_stack++;
3581  gro->gsobjno = gl2ps->objects_stack ++;
3582  }
3583  else if(t.prop & T_CONST_COLOR && t.prop & T_VAR_ALPHA){
3584  gro->gsno = gl2ps->extgs_stack++;
3585  gro->gsobjno = gl2ps->objects_stack++;
3586  gro->trgroupno = gl2ps->trgroupobjects_stack++;
3587  gro->trgroupobjno = gl2ps->objects_stack++;
3588  gro->maskshno = gl2ps->mshader_stack++;
3589  gro->maskshobjno = gl2ps->objects_stack++;
3590  }
3591  else if(t.prop & T_VAR_COLOR && t.prop & T_ALPHA_1){
3592  gro->shno = gl2ps->shader_stack++;
3593  gro->shobjno = gl2ps->objects_stack++;
3594  }
3595  else if(t.prop & T_VAR_COLOR && t.prop & T_ALPHA_LESS_1){
3596  gro->gsno = gl2ps->extgs_stack++;
3597  gro->gsobjno = gl2ps->objects_stack++;
3598  gro->shno = gl2ps->shader_stack++;
3599  gro->shobjno = gl2ps->objects_stack++;
3600  }
3601  else if(t.prop & T_VAR_COLOR && t.prop & T_VAR_ALPHA){
3602  gro->gsno = gl2ps->extgs_stack++;
3603  gro->gsobjno = gl2ps->objects_stack++;
3604  gro->shno = gl2ps->shader_stack++;
3605  gro->shobjno = gl2ps->objects_stack++;
3606  gro->trgroupno = gl2ps->trgroupobjects_stack++;
3607  gro->trgroupobjno = gl2ps->objects_stack++;
3608  gro->maskshno = gl2ps->mshader_stack++;
3609  gro->maskshobjno = gl2ps->objects_stack++;
3610  }
3611 }
3612 
3613 /* Main stream data */
3614 
3615 static void gl2psPDFgroupListWriteMainStream(void)
3616 {
3617  int i, j, lastel;
3618  GL2PSprimitive *prim = NULL, *prev = NULL;
3619  GL2PSpdfgroup *gro;
3620  GL2PStriangle t;
3621 
3622  if(!gl2ps->pdfgrouplist)
3623  return;
3624 
3625  for(i = 0; i < gl2psListNbr(gl2ps->pdfgrouplist); ++i){
3626  gro = (GL2PSpdfgroup*)gl2psListPointer(gl2ps->pdfgrouplist, i);
3627 
3628  lastel = gl2psListNbr(gro->ptrlist) - 1;
3629  if(lastel < 0)
3630  continue;
3631 
3632  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(gro->ptrlist, 0);
3633 
3634  switch(prim->type){
3635  case GL2PS_POINT:
3636  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintf("1 J\n");
3637  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintPDFLineWidth(prim->width);
3638  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintPDFStrokeColor(prim->verts[0].rgba);
3639  for(j = 0; j <= lastel; ++j){
3640  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(gro->ptrlist, j);
3641  gl2ps->streamlength +=
3642  gl2psPrintf("%f %f m %f %f l\n",
3643  prim->verts[0].xyz[0], prim->verts[0].xyz[1],
3644  prim->verts[0].xyz[0], prim->verts[0].xyz[1]);
3645  }
3646  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintf("S\n");
3647  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintf("0 J\n");
3648  break;
3649  case GL2PS_LINE:
3650  /* We try to use as few paths as possible to draw lines, in
3651  order to get nice stippling even when the individual segments
3652  are smaller than the stipple */
3653  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintPDFLineWidth(prim->width);
3654  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintPDFStrokeColor(prim->verts[0].rgba);
3655  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintPostScriptDash(prim->pattern, prim->factor, "d");
3656  /* start new path */
3657  gl2ps->streamlength +=
3658  gl2psPrintf("%f %f m\n",
3659  prim->verts[0].xyz[0], prim->verts[0].xyz[1]);
3660 
3661  for(j = 1; j <= lastel; ++j){
3662  prev = prim;
3663  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(gro->ptrlist, j);
3664  if(!gl2psSamePosition(prim->verts[0].xyz, prev->verts[1].xyz)){
3665  /* the starting point of the new segment does not match the
3666  end point of the previous line, so we end the current
3667  path and start a new one */
3668  gl2ps->streamlength +=
3669  gl2psPrintf("%f %f l\n",
3670  prev->verts[1].xyz[0], prev->verts[1].xyz[1]);
3671  gl2ps->streamlength +=
3672  gl2psPrintf("%f %f m\n",
3673  prim->verts[0].xyz[0], prim->verts[0].xyz[1]);
3674  }
3675  else{
3676  /* the two segements are connected, so we just append to the
3677  current path */
3678  gl2ps->streamlength +=
3679  gl2psPrintf("%f %f l\n",
3680  prim->verts[0].xyz[0], prim->verts[0].xyz[1]);
3681  }
3682  }
3683  /* end last path */
3684  gl2ps->streamlength +=
3685  gl2psPrintf("%f %f l\n",
3686  prim->verts[1].xyz[0], prim->verts[1].xyz[1]);
3687  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintf("S\n");
3688  break;
3689  case GL2PS_TRIANGLE:
3690  gl2psFillTriangleFromPrimitive(&t, prim, GL_TRUE);
3691  gl2psSortOutTrianglePDFgroup(gro);
3692 
3693  /* No alpha and const color: Simple PDF draw orders */
3694  if(t.prop & T_CONST_COLOR && t.prop & T_ALPHA_1){
3695  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintPDFFillColor(t.vertex[0].rgba);
3696  for(j = 0; j <= lastel; ++j){
3697  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(gro->ptrlist, j);
3698  gl2psFillTriangleFromPrimitive(&t, prim, GL_FALSE);
3699  gl2ps->streamlength
3700  += gl2psPrintf("%f %f m\n"
3701  "%f %f l\n"
3702  "%f %f l\n"
3703  "h f\n",
3704  t.vertex[0].xyz[0], t.vertex[0].xyz[1],
3705  t.vertex[1].xyz[0], t.vertex[1].xyz[1],
3706  t.vertex[2].xyz[0], t.vertex[2].xyz[1]);
3707  }
3708  }
3709  /* Const alpha < 1 and const color: Simple PDF draw orders
3710  and an extra extended Graphics State for the alpha const */
3711  else if(t.prop & T_CONST_COLOR && t.prop & T_ALPHA_LESS_1){
3712  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintf("q\n"
3713  "/GS%d gs\n",
3714  gro->gsno);
3715  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintPDFFillColor(prim->verts[0].rgba);
3716  for(j = 0; j <= lastel; ++j){
3717  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(gro->ptrlist, j);
3718  gl2psFillTriangleFromPrimitive(&t, prim, GL_FALSE);
3719  gl2ps->streamlength
3720  += gl2psPrintf("%f %f m\n"
3721  "%f %f l\n"
3722  "%f %f l\n"
3723  "h f\n",
3724  t.vertex[0].xyz[0], t.vertex[0].xyz[1],
3725  t.vertex[1].xyz[0], t.vertex[1].xyz[1],
3726  t.vertex[2].xyz[0], t.vertex[2].xyz[1]);
3727  }
3728  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintf("Q\n");
3729  }
3730  /* Variable alpha and const color: Simple PDF draw orders
3731  and an extra extended Graphics State + Xobject + Shader
3732  object for the alpha mask */
3733  else if(t.prop & T_CONST_COLOR && t.prop & T_VAR_ALPHA){
3734  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintf("q\n"
3735  "/GS%d gs\n"
3736  "/TrG%d Do\n",
3737  gro->gsno, gro->trgroupno);
3738  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintPDFFillColor(prim->verts[0].rgba);
3739  for(j = 0; j <= lastel; ++j){
3740  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(gro->ptrlist, j);
3741  gl2psFillTriangleFromPrimitive(&t, prim, GL_FALSE);
3742  gl2ps->streamlength
3743  += gl2psPrintf("%f %f m\n"
3744  "%f %f l\n"
3745  "%f %f l\n"
3746  "h f\n",
3747  t.vertex[0].xyz[0], t.vertex[0].xyz[1],
3748  t.vertex[1].xyz[0], t.vertex[1].xyz[1],
3749  t.vertex[2].xyz[0], t.vertex[2].xyz[1]);
3750  }
3751  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintf("Q\n");
3752  }
3753  /* Variable color and no alpha: Shader Object for the colored
3754  triangle(s) */
3755  else if(t.prop & T_VAR_COLOR && t.prop & T_ALPHA_1){
3756  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintf("/Sh%d sh\n", gro->shno);
3757  }
3758  /* Variable color and const alpha < 1: Shader Object for the
3759  colored triangle(s) and an extra extended Graphics State
3760  for the alpha const */
3761  else if(t.prop & T_VAR_COLOR && t.prop & T_ALPHA_LESS_1){
3762  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintf("q\n"
3763  "/GS%d gs\n"
3764  "/Sh%d sh\n"
3765  "Q\n",
3766  gro->gsno, gro->shno);
3767  }
3768  /* Variable alpha and color: Shader Object for the colored
3769  triangle(s) and an extra extended Graphics State
3770  + Xobject + Shader object for the alpha mask */
3771  else if(t.prop & T_VAR_COLOR && t.prop & T_VAR_ALPHA){
3772  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintf("q\n"
3773  "/GS%d gs\n"
3774  "/TrG%d Do\n"
3775  "/Sh%d sh\n"
3776  "Q\n",
3777  gro->gsno, gro->trgroupno, gro->shno);
3778  }
3779  break;
3780  case GL2PS_PIXMAP:
3781  for(j = 0; j <= lastel; ++j){
3782  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(gro->ptrlist, j);
3783  gl2psPutPDFImage(prim->data.image, gro->imno, prim->verts[0].xyz[0],
3784  prim->verts[0].xyz[1]);
3785  }
3786  break;
3787  case GL2PS_TEXT:
3788  for(j = 0; j <= lastel; ++j){
3789  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(gro->ptrlist, j);
3790  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintPDFFillColor(prim->verts[0].rgba);
3791  gl2psPutPDFText(prim->data.text, gro->fontno, prim->verts[0].xyz[0],
3792  prim->verts[0].xyz[1]);
3793  }
3794  break;
3795  default:
3796  break;
3797  }
3798  }
3799 }

3919 /* Print 1st PDF object - file info */
3920 
3921 static int gl2psPrintPDFInfo(void)
3922 {
3923  int offs;
3924  time_t now;
3925  struct tm *newtime;
3926 
3927  time(&now);
3928  newtime = gmtime(&now);
3929 
3930  offs = fprintf(gl2ps->stream,
3931  "1 0 obj\n"
3932  "<<\n"
3933  "/Title (%s)\n"
3934  "/Creator (GL2PS %d.%d.%d%s, %s)\n"
3935  "/Producer (%s)\n",
3936  gl2ps->title, GL2PS_MAJOR_VERSION, GL2PS_MINOR_VERSION,
3937  GL2PS_PATCH_VERSION, GL2PS_EXTRA_VERSION, GL2PS_COPYRIGHT,
3938  gl2ps->producer);
3939 
3940  if(!newtime){
3941  offs += fprintf(gl2ps->stream,
3942  ">>\n"
3943  "endobj\n");
3944  return offs;
3945  }
3946 
3947  offs += fprintf(gl2ps->stream,
3948  "/CreationDate (D:%d%02d%02d%02d%02d%02d)\n"
3949  ">>\n"
3950  "endobj\n",
3951  newtime->tm_year+1900,
3952  newtime->tm_mon+1,
3953  newtime->tm_mday,
3954  newtime->tm_hour,
3955  newtime->tm_min,
3956  newtime->tm_sec);
3957  return offs;
3958 }

4175 
4176 /* Put vertex' edge flag (8bit) and coordinates (32bit) in shader stream */
4177 
4178 static int gl2psPrintPDFShaderStreamDataCoord(GL2PSvertex *vertex,
4179  int (*action)(unsigned long data, int size),
4180  GLfloat dx, GLfloat dy,
4181  GLfloat xmin, GLfloat ymin)
4182 {
4183  int offs = 0;
4184  unsigned long imap;
4185  GLfloat diff;
4186  double dmax = ~1UL;
4187  char edgeflag = 0;
4188 
4189  /* FIXME: temp bux fix for 64 bit archs: */
4190  if(sizeof(unsigned long) == 8) dmax = dmax - 2048.;
4191 
4192  offs += (*action)(edgeflag, 1);
4193 
4194  /* The Shader stream in PDF requires to be in a 'big-endian'
4195  order */
4196 
4197  if(GL2PS_ZERO(dx * dy)){
4198  offs += (*action)(0, 4);
4199  offs += (*action)(0, 4);
4200  }
4201  else{
4202  diff = (vertex->xyz[0] - xmin) / dx;
4203  if(diff > 1)
4204  diff = 1.0F;
4205  else if(diff < 0)
4206  diff = 0.0F;
4207  imap = (unsigned long)(diff * dmax);
4208  offs += (*action)(imap, 4);
4209 
4210  diff = (vertex->xyz[1] - ymin) / dy;
4211  if(diff > 1)
4212  diff = 1.0F;
4213  else if(diff < 0)
4214  diff = 0.0F;
4215  imap = (unsigned long)(diff * dmax);
4216  offs += (*action)(imap, 4);
4217  }
4218 
4219  return offs;
4220 }
4221 
4222 /* Put vertex' rgb value (8bit for every component) in shader stream */
4223 
4224 static int gl2psPrintPDFShaderStreamDataRGB(GL2PSvertex *vertex,
4225  int (*action)(unsigned long data, int size))
4226 {
4227  int offs = 0;
4228  unsigned long imap;
4229  double dmax = ~1UL;
4230 
4231  /* FIXME: temp bux fix for 64 bit archs: */
4232  if(sizeof(unsigned long) == 8) dmax = dmax - 2048.;
4233 
4234  imap = (unsigned long)((vertex->rgba[0]) * dmax);
4235  offs += (*action)(imap, 1);
4236 
4237  imap = (unsigned long)((vertex->rgba[1]) * dmax);
4238  offs += (*action)(imap, 1);
4239 
4240  imap = (unsigned long)((vertex->rgba[2]) * dmax);
4241  offs += (*action)(imap, 1);
4242 
4243  return offs;
4244 }
4245 
4246 /* Put vertex' alpha (8/16bit) in shader stream */
4247 
4248 static int gl2psPrintPDFShaderStreamDataAlpha(GL2PSvertex *vertex,
4249  int (*action)(unsigned long data, int size),
4250  int sigbyte)
4251 {
4252  int offs = 0;
4253  unsigned long imap;
4254  double dmax = ~1UL;
4255 
4256  /* FIXME: temp bux fix for 64 bit archs: */
4257  if(sizeof(unsigned long) == 8) dmax = dmax - 2048.;
4258 
4259  if(sigbyte != 8 && sigbyte != 16)
4260  sigbyte = 8;
4261 
4262  sigbyte /= 8;
4263 
4264  imap = (unsigned long)((vertex->rgba[3]) * dmax);
4265 
4266  offs += (*action)(imap, sigbyte);
4267 
4268  return offs;
4269 }
4270 
4271 /* Put a triangles raw data in shader stream */
4272 
4273 static int gl2psPrintPDFShaderStreamData(GL2PStriangle *triangle,
4274  GLfloat dx, GLfloat dy,
4275  GLfloat xmin, GLfloat ymin,
4276  int (*action)(unsigned long data, int size),
4277  int gray)
4278 {
4279  int i, offs = 0;
4280  GL2PSvertex v;
4281 
4282  if(gray && gray != 8 && gray != 16)
4283  gray = 8;
4284 
4285  for(i = 0; i < 3; ++i){
4286  offs += gl2psPrintPDFShaderStreamDataCoord(&triangle->vertex[i], action,
4287  dx, dy, xmin, ymin);
4288  if(gray){
4289  v = triangle->vertex[i];
4290  offs += gl2psPrintPDFShaderStreamDataAlpha(&v, action, gray);
4291  }
4292  else{
4293  offs += gl2psPrintPDFShaderStreamDataRGB(&triangle->vertex[i], action);
4294  }
4295  }
4296 
4297  return offs;
4298 }
4299 
4300 static void gl2psPDFRectHull(GLfloat *xmin, GLfloat *xmax,
4301  GLfloat *ymin, GLfloat *ymax,
4302  GL2PStriangle *triangles, int cnt)
4303 {
4304  int i, j;
4305 
4306  *xmin = triangles[0].vertex[0].xyz[0];
4307  *xmax = triangles[0].vertex[0].xyz[0];
4308  *ymin = triangles[0].vertex[0].xyz[1];
4309  *ymax = triangles[0].vertex[0].xyz[1];
4310 
4311  for(i = 0; i < cnt; ++i){
4312  for(j = 0; j < 3; ++j){
4313  if(*xmin > triangles[i].vertex[j].xyz[0])
4314  *xmin = triangles[i].vertex[j].xyz[0];
4315  if(*xmax < triangles[i].vertex[j].xyz[0])
4316  *xmax = triangles[i].vertex[j].xyz[0];
4317  if(*ymin > triangles[i].vertex[j].xyz[1])
4318  *ymin = triangles[i].vertex[j].xyz[1];
4319  if(*ymax < triangles[i].vertex[j].xyz[1])
4320  *ymax = triangles[i].vertex[j].xyz[1];
4321  }
4322  }
4323 }
4324 
4325 /* Writes shaded triangle
4326  gray == 0 means write RGB triangles
4327  gray == 8 8bit-grayscale (for alpha masks)
4328  gray == 16 16bit-grayscale (for alpha masks) */
4329 
4330 static int gl2psPrintPDFShader(int obj, GL2PStriangle *triangles,
4331  int size, int gray)
4332 {
4333  int i, offs = 0, vertexbytes, done = 0;
4334  GLfloat xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax;
4335 
4336  switch(gray){
4337  case 0:
4338  vertexbytes = 1+4+4+1+1+1;
4339  break;
4340  case 8:
4341  vertexbytes = 1+4+4+1;
4342  break;
4343  case 16:
4344  vertexbytes = 1+4+4+2;
4345  break;
4346  default:
4347  gray = 8;
4348  vertexbytes = 1+4+4+1;
4349  break;
4350  }
4351 
4352  gl2psPDFRectHull(&xmin, &xmax, &ymin, &ymax, triangles, size);
4353 
4354  offs += fprintf(gl2ps->stream,
4355  "%d 0 obj\n"
4356  "<< "
4357  "/ShadingType 4 "
4358  "/ColorSpace %s "
4359  "/BitsPerCoordinate 32 "
4360  "/BitsPerComponent %d "
4361  "/BitsPerFlag 8 "
4362  "/Decode [%f %f %f %f 0 1 %s] ",
4363  obj,
4364  (gray) ? "/DeviceGray" : "/DeviceRGB",
4365  (gray) ? gray : 8,
4366  xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax,
4367  (gray) ? "" : "0 1 0 1");
4368 
4369 #if defined(GL2PS_HAVE_ZLIB)
4370  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_COMPRESS){
4371  gl2psAllocCompress(vertexbytes * size * 3);
4372 
4373  for(i = 0; i < size; ++i)
4374  gl2psPrintPDFShaderStreamData(&triangles[i],
4375  xmax-xmin, ymax-ymin, xmin, ymin,
4376  gl2psWriteBigEndianCompress, gray);
4377 
4378  if(Z_OK == gl2psDeflate() && 23 + gl2ps->compress->destLen < gl2ps->compress->srcLen){
4379  offs += gl2psPrintPDFCompressorType();
4380  offs += fprintf(gl2ps->stream,
4381  "/Length %d "
4382  ">>\n"
4383  "stream\n",
4384  (int)gl2ps->compress->destLen);
4385  offs += gl2ps->compress->destLen * fwrite(gl2ps->compress->dest,
4386  gl2ps->compress->destLen,
4387  1, gl2ps->stream);
4388  done = 1;
4389  }
4390  gl2psFreeCompress();
4391  }
4392 #endif
4393 
4394  if(!done){
4395  /* no compression, or too long after compression, or compress error
4396  -> write non-compressed entry */
4397  offs += fprintf(gl2ps->stream,
4398  "/Length %d "
4399  ">>\n"
4400  "stream\n",
4401  vertexbytes * 3 * size);
4402  for(i = 0; i < size; ++i)
4403  offs += gl2psPrintPDFShaderStreamData(&triangles[i],
4404  xmax-xmin, ymax-ymin, xmin, ymin,
4405  gl2psWriteBigEndian, gray);
4406  }
4407 
4408  offs += fprintf(gl2ps->stream,
4409  "\nendstream\n"
4410  "endobj\n");
4411 
4412  return offs;
4413 }

4491 /* Similar groups of functions for pixmaps and text */
4492 
4493 static int gl2psPrintPDFPixmapStreamData(GL2PSimage *im,
4494  int (*action)(unsigned long data, int size),
4495  int gray)
4496 {
4497  int x, y, shift;
4498  GLfloat r, g, b, a;
4499 
4500  if(im->format != GL_RGBA && gray)
4501  return 0;
4502 
4503  if(gray && gray != 8 && gray != 16)
4504  gray = 8;
4505 
4506  gray /= 8;
4507 
4508  shift = (sizeof(unsigned long) - 1) * 8;
4509 
4510  for(y = 0; y < im->height; ++y){
4511  for(x = 0; x < im->width; ++x){
4512  a = gl2psGetRGB(im, x, y, &r, &g, &b);
4513  if(im->format == GL_RGBA && gray){
4514  (*action)((unsigned long)(a * 255) << shift, gray);
4515  }
4516  else{
4517  (*action)((unsigned long)(r * 255) << shift, 1);
4518  (*action)((unsigned long)(g * 255) << shift, 1);
4519  (*action)((unsigned long)(b * 255) << shift, 1);
4520  }
4521  }
4522  }
4523 
4524  switch(gray){
4525  case 0: return 3 * im->width * im->height;
4526  case 1: return im->width * im->height;
4527  case 2: return 2 * im->width * im->height;
4528  default: return 3 * im->width * im->height;
4529  }
4530 }
4531

4550  "/BitsPerComponent 8\n",

4552  (int)im->width, (int)im->height,
4553  (gray) ? "/DeviceGray" : "/DeviceRGB" );
4554  if(GL_RGBA == im->format && gray == 0){
4555  offs += fprintf(gl2ps->stream,

4617 /* Write the physical objects */
4618 
4619 static int gl2psPDFgroupListWriteObjects(int entryoffs)
4620 {
4621  int i,j;
4622  GL2PSprimitive *p = NULL;
4623  GL2PSpdfgroup *gro;
4624  int offs = entryoffs;
4625  GL2PStriangle *triangles;
4626  int size = 0;
4627 
4628  if(!gl2ps->pdfgrouplist)
4629  return offs;
4630 
4631  for(i = 0; i < gl2psListNbr(gl2ps->pdfgrouplist); ++i){
4632  gro = (GL2PSpdfgroup*)gl2psListPointer(gl2ps->pdfgrouplist, i);
4633  if(!gl2psListNbr(gro->ptrlist))
4634  continue;
4635  p = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(gro->ptrlist, 0);
4636  switch(p->type){
4637  case GL2PS_POINT:
4638  break;
4639  case GL2PS_LINE:
4640  break;
4641  case GL2PS_TRIANGLE:
4642  size = gl2psListNbr(gro->ptrlist);
4643  triangles = (GL2PStriangle*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PStriangle) * size);
4644  for(j = 0; j < size; ++j){
4645  p = *(GL2PSprimitive**)gl2psListPointer(gro->ptrlist, j);
4646  gl2psFillTriangleFromPrimitive(&triangles[j], p, GL_TRUE);
4647  }
4648  if(triangles[0].prop & T_VAR_COLOR){
4649  gl2ps->xreflist[gro->shobjno] = offs;
4650  offs += gl2psPrintPDFShader(gro->shobjno, triangles, size, 0);
4651  }
4652  if(triangles[0].prop & T_ALPHA_LESS_1){
4653  gl2ps->xreflist[gro->gsobjno] = offs;
4654  offs += gl2psPrintPDFShaderSimpleExtGS(gro->gsobjno, triangles[0].vertex[0].rgba[3]);
4655  }
4656  if(triangles[0].prop & T_VAR_ALPHA){
4657  gl2ps->xreflist[gro->gsobjno] = offs;
4658  offs += gl2psPrintPDFShaderExtGS(gro->gsobjno, gro->trgroupobjno);
4659  gl2ps->xreflist[gro->trgroupobjno] = offs;
4660  offs += gl2psPrintPDFShaderMask(gro->trgroupobjno, gro->maskshno);
4661  gl2ps->xreflist[gro->maskshobjno] = offs;
4662  offs += gl2psPrintPDFShader(gro->maskshobjno, triangles, size, 8);
4663  }
4664  gl2psFree(triangles);
4665  break;
4666  case GL2PS_PIXMAP:
4667  gl2ps->xreflist[gro->imobjno] = offs;
4668  offs += gl2psPrintPDFPixmap(gro->imobjno, gro->imobjno+1, p->data.image, 0);
4669  if(p->data.image->format == GL_RGBA){
4670  gl2ps->xreflist[gro->imobjno+1] = offs;
4671  offs += gl2psPrintPDFPixmap(gro->imobjno+1, -1, p->data.image, 8);
4672  }
4673  break;
4674  case GL2PS_TEXT:
4675  gl2ps->xreflist[gro->fontobjno] = offs;
4676  offs += gl2psPrintPDFText(gro->fontobjno,p->data.text,gro->fontno);
4677  break;
4678  case GL2PS_SPECIAL :
4679  /* alignment contains the format for which the special output text
4680  is intended */
4681  if(p->data.text->alignment == GL2PS_PDF)
4682  offs += fprintf(gl2ps->stream, "%s\n", p->data.text->str);
4683  break;
4684  default:
4685  break;
4686  }
4687  }
4688  return offs;
4689 }
4690 
4691 /* All variable data has been written at this point and all required
4692  functioninality has been gathered, so we can write now file footer
4693  with cross reference table and trailer */
4694 
4695 static void gl2psPrintPDFFooter(void)
4696 {
4697  int i, offs;
4698 
4699  gl2psPDFgroupListInit();
4700  gl2psPDFgroupListWriteMainStream();
4701 
4702  offs = gl2ps->xreflist[5] + gl2ps->streamlength;
4703  offs += gl2psClosePDFDataStream();
4704  gl2ps->xreflist[5] = offs;
4705 
4706  offs += gl2psPrintPDFDataStreamLength(gl2ps->streamlength);
4707  gl2ps->xreflist[6] = offs;
4708  gl2ps->streamlength = 0;
4709 
4710  offs += gl2psPrintPDFOpenPage();
4711  offs += gl2psPDFgroupListWriteVariableResources();
4712  gl2ps->xreflist = (int*)gl2psRealloc(gl2ps->xreflist,
4713  sizeof(int) * (gl2ps->objects_stack + 1));
4714  gl2ps->xreflist[7] = offs;
4715 
4716  offs += gl2psPrintPDFGSObject();
4717  gl2ps->xreflist[8] = offs;
4718 
4719  gl2ps->xreflist[gl2ps->objects_stack] =
4720  gl2psPDFgroupListWriteObjects(gl2ps->xreflist[8]);
4721 
4722  /* Start cross reference table. The file has to been opened in
4723  binary mode to preserve the 20 digit string length! */
4724  fprintf(gl2ps->stream,
4725  "xref\n"
4726  "0 %d\n"
4727  "%010d 65535 f \n", gl2ps->objects_stack, 0);
4728 
4729  for(i = 1; i < gl2ps->objects_stack; ++i)
4730  fprintf(gl2ps->stream, "%010d 00000 n \n", gl2ps->xreflist[i]);
4731 
4732  fprintf(gl2ps->stream,
4733  "trailer\n"
4734  "<<\n"
4735  "/Size %d\n"
4736  "/Info 1 0 R\n"
4737  "/Root 2 0 R\n"
4738  ">>\n"
4739  "startxref\n%d\n"
4740  "%%%%EOF\n",
4741  gl2ps->objects_stack, gl2ps->xreflist[gl2ps->objects_stack]);
4742 
4743  /* Free auxiliary lists and arrays */
4744  gl2psFree(gl2ps->xreflist);
4745  gl2psListAction(gl2ps->pdfprimlist, gl2psFreePrimitive);
4746  gl2psListDelete(gl2ps->pdfprimlist);
4747  gl2psPDFgroupListDelete();
4748 
4749 #if defined(GL2PS_HAVE_ZLIB)
4750  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_COMPRESS){
4751  gl2psFreeCompress();
4752  gl2psFree(gl2ps->compress);
4753  gl2ps->compress = NULL;
4754  }
4755 #endif
4756 }
4757 
4758 /* PDF begin viewport */
4759 
4760 static void gl2psPrintPDFBeginViewport(GLint viewport[4])
4761 {
4762  int offs = 0;
4763  GLint index;
4764  GLfloat rgba[4];
4765  int x = viewport[0], y = viewport[1], w = viewport[2], h = viewport[3];
4766 
4767  glRenderMode(GL_FEEDBACK);
4768 
4769  if(gl2ps->header){
4770  gl2psPrintPDFHeader();
4771  gl2ps->header = GL_FALSE;
4772  }
4773 
4774  offs += gl2psPrintf("q\n");
4775 
4776  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_DRAW_BACKGROUND){
4777  if(gl2ps->colormode == GL_RGBA || gl2ps->colorsize == 0){
4778  glGetFloatv(GL_COLOR_CLEAR_VALUE, rgba);
4779  }
4780  else{
4781  glGetIntegerv(GL_INDEX_CLEAR_VALUE, &index);
4782  rgba[0] = gl2ps->colormap[index][0];
4783  rgba[1] = gl2ps->colormap[index][1];
4784  rgba[2] = gl2ps->colormap[index][2];
4785  rgba[3] = 1.0F;
4786  }
4787  offs += gl2psPrintPDFFillColor(rgba);
4788  offs += gl2psPrintf("%d %d %d %d re\n"
4789  "W\n"
4790  "f\n",
4791  x, y, w, h);
4792  }
4793  else{
4794  offs += gl2psPrintf("%d %d %d %d re\n"
4795  "W\n"
4796  "n\n",
4797  x, y, w, h);
4798  }
4799 
4800  gl2ps->streamlength += offs;
4801 }
4802 
4803 static GLint gl2psPrintPDFEndViewport(void)
4804 {
4805  GLint res;
4806 
4807  res = gl2psPrintPrimitives();
4808  gl2ps->streamlength += gl2psPrintf("Q\n");
4809  return res;
4810 }

4831  * SVG routines

4834 
4835 static void gl2psSVGGetCoordsAndColors(int n, GL2PSvertex *verts,
4836  GL2PSxyz *xyz, GL2PSrgba *rgba)
4837 {
4838  int i, j;
4839 
4840  for(i = 0; i < n; i++){
4841  xyz[i][0] = verts[i].xyz[0];
4842  xyz[i][1] = gl2ps->viewport[3] - verts[i].xyz[1];
4843  xyz[i][2] = 0.0F;
4844  for(j = 0; j < 4; j++)
4845  rgba[i][j] = verts[i].rgba[j];
4846  }
4847 }
4848 
4849 static void gl2psSVGGetColorString(GL2PSrgba rgba, char str[32])
4850 {
4851  int r = (int)(255. * rgba[0]);
4852  int g = (int)(255. * rgba[1]);
4853  int b = (int)(255. * rgba[2]);
4854  int rc = (r < 0) ? 0 : (r > 255) ? 255 : r;
4855  int gc = (g < 0) ? 0 : (g > 255) ? 255 : g;
4856  int bc = (b < 0) ? 0 : (b > 255) ? 255 : b;
4857  sprintf(str, "#%2.2x%2.2x%2.2x", rc, gc, bc);
4858 }
4859 
4860 static void gl2psPrintSVGHeader(void)
4861 {
4862  int x, y, width, height;
4863  char col[32];
4864  time_t now;
4865 
4866  time(&now);
4867 
4868  if (gl2ps->options & GL2PS_LANDSCAPE){
4869  x = (int)gl2ps->viewport[1];
4870  y = (int)gl2ps->viewport[0];
4871  width = (int)gl2ps->viewport[3];
4872  height = (int)gl2ps->viewport[2];
4873  }
4874  else{
4875  x = (int)gl2ps->viewport[0];
4876  y = (int)gl2ps->viewport[1];
4877  width = (int)gl2ps->viewport[2];
4878  height = (int)gl2ps->viewport[3];
4879  }
4880 
4881  /* Compressed SVG files (.svgz) are simply gzipped SVG files */
4882  gl2psPrintGzipHeader();
4883 
4884  gl2psPrintf("<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" standalone=\"no\"?>\n");
4885  gl2psPrintf("<svg xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\"\n");
4886  gl2psPrintf(" xmlns:xlink=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink\"\n"
4887  " width=\"%dpx\" height=\"%dpx\" viewBox=\"%d %d %d %d\">\n",
4888  width, height, x, y, width, height);
4889  gl2psPrintf("<title>%s</title>\n", gl2ps->title);
4890  gl2psPrintf("<desc>\n");
4891  gl2psPrintf("Creator: GL2PS %d.%d.%d%s, %s\n"
4892  "For: %s\n"
4893  "CreationDate: %s",
4894  GL2PS_MAJOR_VERSION, GL2PS_MINOR_VERSION, GL2PS_PATCH_VERSION,
4895  GL2PS_EXTRA_VERSION, GL2PS_COPYRIGHT, gl2ps->producer, ctime(&now));
4896  gl2psPrintf("</desc>\n");
4897  gl2psPrintf("<defs>\n");
4898  gl2psPrintf("</defs>\n");
4899 
4900  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_DRAW_BACKGROUND){
4901  gl2psSVGGetColorString(gl2ps->bgcolor, col);
4902  gl2psPrintf("<polygon fill=\"%s\" points=\"%d,%d %d,%d %d,%d %d,%d\"/>\n", col,
4903  (int)gl2ps->viewport[0], (int)gl2ps->viewport[1],
4904  (int)gl2ps->viewport[2], (int)gl2ps->viewport[1],
4905  (int)gl2ps->viewport[2], (int)gl2ps->viewport[3],
4906  (int)gl2ps->viewport[0], (int)gl2ps->viewport[3]);
4907  }
4908 
4909  /* group all the primitives and disable antialiasing */
4910  gl2psPrintf("<g shape-rendering=\"crispEdges\">\n");
4911 }
4912 
4913 static void gl2psPrintSVGSmoothTriangle(GL2PSxyz xyz[3], GL2PSrgba rgba[3])
4914 {
4915  int i;
4916  GL2PSxyz xyz2[3];
4917  GL2PSrgba rgba2[3];
4918  char col[32];
4919 
4920  /* Apparently there is no easy way to do Gouraud shading in SVG
4921  without explicitly pre-defining gradients, so for now we just do
4922  recursive subdivision */
4923 
4924  if(gl2psSameColorThreshold(3, rgba, gl2ps->threshold)){
4925  gl2psSVGGetColorString(rgba[0], col);
4926  gl2psPrintf("<polygon fill=\"%s\" ", col);
4927  if(rgba[0][3] < 1.0F) gl2psPrintf("fill-opacity=\"%g\" ", rgba[0][3]);
4928  gl2psPrintf("points=\"%g,%g %g,%g %g,%g\"/>\n", xyz[0][0], xyz[0][1],
4929  xyz[1][0], xyz[1][1], xyz[2][0], xyz[2][1]);
4930  }
4931  else{
4932  /* subdivide into 4 subtriangles */
4933  for(i = 0; i < 3; i++){
4934  xyz2[0][i] = xyz[0][i];
4935  xyz2[1][i] = 0.5F * (xyz[0][i] + xyz[1][i]);
4936  xyz2[2][i] = 0.5F * (xyz[0][i] + xyz[2][i]);
4937  }
4938  for(i = 0; i < 4; i++){
4939  rgba2[0][i] = rgba[0][i];
4940  rgba2[1][i] = 0.5F * (rgba[0][i] + rgba[1][i]);
4941  rgba2[2][i] = 0.5F * (rgba[0][i] + rgba[2][i]);
4942  }
4943  gl2psPrintSVGSmoothTriangle(xyz2, rgba2);
4944  for(i = 0; i < 3; i++){
4945  xyz2[0][i] = 0.5F * (xyz[0][i] + xyz[1][i]);
4946  xyz2[1][i] = xyz[1][i];
4947  xyz2[2][i] = 0.5F * (xyz[1][i] + xyz[2][i]);
4948  }
4949  for(i = 0; i < 4; i++){
4950  rgba2[0][i] = 0.5F * (rgba[0][i] + rgba[1][i]);
4951  rgba2[1][i] = rgba[1][i];
4952  rgba2[2][i] = 0.5F * (rgba[1][i] + rgba[2][i]);
4953  }
4954  gl2psPrintSVGSmoothTriangle(xyz2, rgba2);
4955  for(i = 0; i < 3; i++){
4956  xyz2[0][i] = 0.5F * (xyz[0][i] + xyz[2][i]);
4957  xyz2[1][i] = xyz[2][i];
4958  xyz2[2][i] = 0.5F * (xyz[1][i] + xyz[2][i]);
4959  }
4960  for(i = 0; i < 4; i++){
4961  rgba2[0][i] = 0.5F * (rgba[0][i] + rgba[2][i]);
4962  rgba2[1][i] = rgba[2][i];
4963  rgba2[2][i] = 0.5F * (rgba[1][i] + rgba[2][i]);
4964  }
4965  gl2psPrintSVGSmoothTriangle(xyz2, rgba2);
4966  for(i = 0; i < 3; i++){
4967  xyz2[0][i] = 0.5F * (xyz[0][i] + xyz[1][i]);
4968  xyz2[1][i] = 0.5F * (xyz[1][i] + xyz[2][i]);
4969  xyz2[2][i] = 0.5F * (xyz[0][i] + xyz[2][i]);
4970  }
4971  for(i = 0; i < 4; i++){
4972  rgba2[0][i] = 0.5F * (rgba[0][i] + rgba[1][i]);
4973  rgba2[1][i] = 0.5F * (rgba[1][i] + rgba[2][i]);
4974  rgba2[2][i] = 0.5F * (rgba[0][i] + rgba[2][i]);
4975  }
4976  gl2psPrintSVGSmoothTriangle(xyz2, rgba2);
4977  }
4978 }
4979 
4980 static void gl2psPrintSVGDash(GLushort pattern, GLint factor)
4981 {
4982  int i, n, array[10];
4983 
4984  if(!pattern || !factor) return; /* solid line */
4985 
4986  gl2psParseStipplePattern(pattern, factor, &n, array);
4987  gl2psPrintf("stroke-dasharray=\"");
4988  for(i = 0; i < n; i++){
4989  if(i) gl2psPrintf(",");
4990  gl2psPrintf("%d", array[i]);
4991  }
4992  gl2psPrintf("\" ");
4993 }
4994 
4995 static void gl2psEndSVGLine(void)
4996 {
4997  int i;
4998  if(gl2ps->lastvertex.rgba[0] >= 0.){
4999  gl2psPrintf("%g,%g\"/>\n", gl2ps->lastvertex.xyz[0],
5000  gl2ps->viewport[3] - gl2ps->lastvertex.xyz[1]);
5001  for(i = 0; i < 3; i++)
5002  gl2ps->lastvertex.xyz[i] = -1.;
5003  for(i = 0; i < 4; i++)
5004  gl2ps->lastvertex.rgba[i] = -1.;
5005  }
5006 }
5007 
5008 static void gl2psPrintSVGPixmap(GLfloat x, GLfloat y, GL2PSimage *pixmap)
5009 {
5010 #if defined(GL2PS_HAVE_LIBPNG)
5011  GL2PSlist *png;
5012  unsigned char c;
5013  int i;
5014 
5015  /* The only image types supported by the SVG standard are JPEG, PNG
5016  and SVG. Here we choose PNG, and since we want to embed the image
5017  directly in the SVG stream (and not link to an external image
5018  file), we need to encode the pixmap into PNG in memory, then
5019  encode it into base64. */
5020 
5021  png = gl2psListCreate(pixmap->width * pixmap->height * 3, 1000,
5022  sizeof(unsigned char));
5023  gl2psConvertPixmapToPNG(pixmap, png);
5024  gl2psListEncodeBase64(png);
5025  gl2psPrintf("<image x=\"%g\" y=\"%g\" width=\"%d\" height=\"%d\"\n",
5026  x, y - pixmap->height, pixmap->width, pixmap->height);
5027  gl2psPrintf("xlink:href=\"data:image/png;base64,");
5028  for(i = 0; i < gl2psListNbr(png); i++){
5029  gl2psListRead(png, i, &c);
5030  gl2psPrintf("%c", c);
5031  }
5032  gl2psPrintf("\"/>\n");
5033  gl2psListDelete(png);
5034 #else
5035  (void) x; (void) y; (void) pixmap; /* not used */
5036  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_WARNING, "GL2PS must be compiled with PNG support in "
5037  "order to embed images in SVG streams");
5038 #endif
5039 }
5040 
5041 static void gl2psPrintSVGPrimitive(void *data)
5042 {
5043  GL2PSprimitive *prim;
5044  GL2PSxyz xyz[4];
5045  GL2PSrgba rgba[4];
5046  char col[32];
5047  int newline;
5048 
5049  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)data;
5050 
5051  if((gl2ps->options & GL2PS_OCCLUSION_CULL) && prim->culled) return;
5052 
5053  /* We try to draw connected lines as a single path to get nice line
5054  joins and correct stippling. So if the primitive to print is not
5055  a line we must first finish the current line (if any): */
5056  if(prim->type != GL2PS_LINE) gl2psEndSVGLine();
5057 
5058  gl2psSVGGetCoordsAndColors(prim->numverts, prim->verts, xyz, rgba);
5059 
5060  switch(prim->type){
5061  case GL2PS_POINT :
5062  gl2psSVGGetColorString(rgba[0], col);
5063  gl2psPrintf("<circle fill=\"%s\" ", col);
5064  if(rgba[0][3] < 1.0F) gl2psPrintf("fill-opacity=\"%g\" ", rgba[0][3]);
5065  gl2psPrintf("cx=\"%g\" cy=\"%g\" r=\"%g\"/>\n",
5066  xyz[0][0], xyz[0][1], 0.5 * prim->width);
5067  break;
5068  case GL2PS_LINE :
5069  if(!gl2psSamePosition(gl2ps->lastvertex.xyz, prim->verts[0].xyz) ||
5070  !gl2psSameColor(gl2ps->lastrgba, prim->verts[0].rgba) ||
5071  gl2ps->lastlinewidth != prim->width ||
5072  gl2ps->lastpattern != prim->pattern ||
5073  gl2ps->lastfactor != prim->factor){
5074  /* End the current line if the new segment does not start where
5075  the last one ended, or if the color, the width or the
5076  stippling have changed (we will need to use multi-point
5077  gradients for smooth-shaded lines) */
5078  gl2psEndSVGLine();
5079  newline = 1;
5080  }
5081  else{
5082  newline = 0;
5083  }
5084  gl2ps->lastvertex = prim->verts[1];
5085  gl2psSetLastColor(prim->verts[0].rgba);
5086  gl2ps->lastlinewidth = prim->width;
5087  gl2ps->lastpattern = prim->pattern;
5088  gl2ps->lastfactor = prim->factor;
5089  if(newline){
5090  gl2psSVGGetColorString(rgba[0], col);
5091  gl2psPrintf("<polyline fill=\"none\" stroke=\"%s\" stroke-width=\"%g\" ",
5092  col, prim->width);
5093  if(rgba[0][3] < 1.0F) gl2psPrintf("stroke-opacity=\"%g\" ", rgba[0][3]);
5094  gl2psPrintSVGDash(prim->pattern, prim->factor);
5095  gl2psPrintf("points=\"%g,%g ", xyz[0][0], xyz[0][1]);
5096  }
5097  else{
5098  gl2psPrintf("%g,%g ", xyz[0][0], xyz[0][1]);
5099  }
5100  break;
5101  case GL2PS_TRIANGLE :
5102  gl2psPrintSVGSmoothTriangle(xyz, rgba);
5103  break;
5104  case GL2PS_QUADRANGLE :
5105  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_WARNING, "There should not be any quad left to print");
5106  break;
5107  case GL2PS_PIXMAP :
5108  gl2psPrintSVGPixmap(xyz[0][0], xyz[0][1], prim->data.image);
5109  break;
5110  case GL2PS_TEXT :
5111  gl2psSVGGetColorString(prim->verts[0].rgba, col);
5112  gl2psPrintf("<text fill=\"%s\" x=\"%g\" y=\"%g\" font-size=\"%d\" ",
5113  col, xyz[0][0], xyz[0][1], prim->data.text->fontsize);
5114  if(prim->data.text->angle)
5115  gl2psPrintf("transform=\"rotate(%g, %g, %g)\" ",
5116  -prim->data.text->angle, xyz[0][0], xyz[0][1]);
5117  switch(prim->data.text->alignment){
5118  case GL2PS_TEXT_C:
5119  gl2psPrintf("text-anchor=\"middle\" baseline-shift=\"%d\" ",
5120  -prim->data.text->fontsize / 2);
5121  break;
5122  case GL2PS_TEXT_CL:
5123  gl2psPrintf("text-anchor=\"start\" baseline-shift=\"%d\" ",
5124  -prim->data.text->fontsize / 2);
5125  break;
5126  case GL2PS_TEXT_CR:
5127  gl2psPrintf("text-anchor=\"end\" baseline-shift=\"%d\" ",
5128  -prim->data.text->fontsize / 2);
5129  break;
5130  case GL2PS_TEXT_B:
5131  gl2psPrintf("text-anchor=\"middle\" baseline-shift=\"0\" ");
5132  break;
5133  case GL2PS_TEXT_BR:
5134  gl2psPrintf("text-anchor=\"end\" baseline-shift=\"0\" ");
5135  break;
5136  case GL2PS_TEXT_T:
5137  gl2psPrintf("text-anchor=\"middle\" baseline-shift=\"%d\" ",
5138  -prim->data.text->fontsize);
5139  break;
5140  case GL2PS_TEXT_TL:
5141  gl2psPrintf("text-anchor=\"start\" baseline-shift=\"%d\" ",
5142  -prim->data.text->fontsize);
5143  break;
5144  case GL2PS_TEXT_TR:
5145  gl2psPrintf("text-anchor=\"end\" baseline-shift=\"%d\" ",
5146  -prim->data.text->fontsize);
5147  break;
5148  case GL2PS_TEXT_BL:
5149  default: /* same as GL2PS_TEXT_BL */
5150  gl2psPrintf("text-anchor=\"start\" baseline-shift=\"0\" ");
5151  break;
5152  }
5153  if(!strcmp(prim->data.text->fontname, "Times-Roman"))
5154  gl2psPrintf("font-family=\"Times\">");
5155  else if(!strcmp(prim->data.text->fontname, "Times-Bold"))
5156  gl2psPrintf("font-family=\"Times\" font-weight=\"bold\">");
5157  else if(!strcmp(prim->data.text->fontname, "Times-Italic"))
5158  gl2psPrintf("font-family=\"Times\" font-style=\"italic\">");
5159  else if(!strcmp(prim->data.text->fontname, "Times-BoldItalic"))
5160  gl2psPrintf("font-family=\"Times\" font-style=\"italic\" font-weight=\"bold\">");
5161  else if(!strcmp(prim->data.text->fontname, "Helvetica-Bold"))
5162  gl2psPrintf("font-family=\"Helvetica\" font-weight=\"bold\">");
5163  else if(!strcmp(prim->data.text->fontname, "Helvetica-Oblique"))
5164  gl2psPrintf("font-family=\"Helvetica\" font-style=\"oblique\">");
5165  else if(!strcmp(prim->data.text->fontname, "Helvetica-BoldOblique"))
5166  gl2psPrintf("font-family=\"Helvetica\" font-style=\"oblique\" font-weight=\"bold\">");
5167  else if(!strcmp(prim->data.text->fontname, "Courier-Bold"))
5168  gl2psPrintf("font-family=\"Courier\" font-weight=\"bold\">");
5169  else if(!strcmp(prim->data.text->fontname, "Courier-Oblique"))
5170  gl2psPrintf("font-family=\"Courier\" font-style=\"oblique\">");
5171  else if(!strcmp(prim->data.text->fontname, "Courier-BoldOblique"))
5172  gl2psPrintf("font-family=\"Courier\" font-style=\"oblique\" font-weight=\"bold\">");
5173  else
5174  gl2psPrintf("font-family=\"%s\">", prim->data.text->fontname);
5175  gl2psPrintf("%s</text>\n", prim->data.text->str);
5176  break;
5177  case GL2PS_SPECIAL :
5178  /* alignment contains the format for which the special output text
5179  is intended */
5180  if(prim->data.text->alignment == GL2PS_SVG)
5181  gl2psPrintf("%s\n", prim->data.text->str);
5182  break;
5183  default :
5184  break;
5185  }
5186 }

5308 static void gl2psPrintPGFDash(GLushort pattern, GLint factor)
5309 {
5310  int i, n, array[10];
5311 
5312  if(pattern == gl2ps->lastpattern && factor == gl2ps->lastfactor)
5313  return;
5314 
5315  gl2ps->lastpattern = pattern;
5316  gl2ps->lastfactor = factor;
5317 
5318  if(!pattern || !factor){
5319  /* solid line */
5320  fprintf(gl2ps->stream, "\\pgfsetdash{}{0pt}\n");
5321  }
5322  else{
5323  gl2psParseStipplePattern(pattern, factor, &n, array);
5324  fprintf(gl2ps->stream, "\\pgfsetdash{");
5325  for(i = 0; i < n; i++) fprintf(gl2ps->stream, "{%dpt}", array[i]);
5326  fprintf(gl2ps->stream, "}{0pt}\n");
5327  }
5328 }

5330 static const char *gl2psPGFTextAlignment(int align)
5331 {
5332  switch(align){
5333  case GL2PS_TEXT_C : return "center";
5334  case GL2PS_TEXT_CL : return "west";
5335  case GL2PS_TEXT_CR : return "east";
5336  case GL2PS_TEXT_B : return "south";
5337  case GL2PS_TEXT_BR : return "south east";
5338  case GL2PS_TEXT_T : return "north";
5339  case GL2PS_TEXT_TL : return "north west";
5340  case GL2PS_TEXT_TR : return "north east";
5341  case GL2PS_TEXT_BL :
5342  default : return "south west";
5343  }
5344 }

5346 static void gl2psPrintPGFPrimitive(void *data)
5347 {
5348  GL2PSprimitive *prim;
5349 
5350  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)data;
5351 
5352  switch(prim->type){
5353  case GL2PS_POINT :
5354  /* Points in openGL are rectangular */
5355  gl2psPrintPGFColor(prim->verts[0].rgba);
5356  fprintf(gl2ps->stream,
5357  "\\pgfpathrectangle{\\pgfpoint{%fpt}{%fpt}}"
5358  "{\\pgfpoint{%fpt}{%fpt}}\n\\pgfusepath{fill}\n",
5359  prim->verts[0].xyz[0]-0.5*prim->width,
5360  prim->verts[0].xyz[1]-0.5*prim->width,
5361  prim->width,prim->width);
5362  break;
5363  case GL2PS_LINE :
5364  gl2psPrintPGFColor(prim->verts[0].rgba);
5365  if(gl2ps->lastlinewidth != prim->width){
5366  gl2ps->lastlinewidth = prim->width;
5367  fprintf(gl2ps->stream, "\\pgfsetlinewidth{%fpt}\n", gl2ps->lastlinewidth);
5368  }
5369  gl2psPrintPGFDash(prim->pattern, prim->factor);
5370  fprintf(gl2ps->stream,
5371  "\\pgfpathmoveto{\\pgfpoint{%fpt}{%fpt}}\n"
5372  "\\pgflineto{\\pgfpoint{%fpt}{%fpt}}\n"
5373  "\\pgfusepath{stroke}\n",
5374  prim->verts[1].xyz[0], prim->verts[1].xyz[1],
5375  prim->verts[0].xyz[0], prim->verts[0].xyz[1]);
5376  break;
5377  case GL2PS_TRIANGLE :
5378  if(gl2ps->lastlinewidth != 0){
5379  gl2ps->lastlinewidth = 0;
5380  fprintf(gl2ps->stream, "\\pgfsetlinewidth{0.01pt}\n");
5381  }
5382  gl2psPrintPGFColor(prim->verts[0].rgba);
5383  fprintf(gl2ps->stream,
5384  "\\pgfpathmoveto{\\pgfpoint{%fpt}{%fpt}}\n"
5385  "\\pgflineto{\\pgfpoint{%fpt}{%fpt}}\n"
5386  "\\pgflineto{\\pgfpoint{%fpt}{%fpt}}\n"
5387  "\\pgfpathclose\n"
5388  "\\pgfusepath{fill,stroke}\n",
5389  prim->verts[2].xyz[0], prim->verts[2].xyz[1],
5390  prim->verts[1].xyz[0], prim->verts[1].xyz[1],
5391  prim->verts[0].xyz[0], prim->verts[0].xyz[1]);
5392  break;
5393  case GL2PS_TEXT :
5394  fprintf(gl2ps->stream, "{\n\\pgftransformshift{\\pgfpoint{%fpt}{%fpt}}\n",
5395  prim->verts[0].xyz[0], prim->verts[0].xyz[1]);
5396 
5397  if(prim->data.text->angle)
5398  fprintf(gl2ps->stream, "\\pgftransformrotate{%f}{", prim->data.text->angle);
5399 
5400  fprintf(gl2ps->stream, "\\pgfnode{rectangle}{%s}{\\fontsize{%d}{0}\\selectfont",
5401  gl2psPGFTextAlignment(prim->data.text->alignment),
5402  prim->data.text->fontsize);
5403 
5404  fprintf(gl2ps->stream, "\\textcolor[rgb]{%g,%g,%g}{{%s}}",
5405  prim->verts[0].rgba[0], prim->verts[0].rgba[1],
5406  prim->verts[0].rgba[2], prim->data.text->str);
5407 
5408  fprintf(gl2ps->stream, "}{}{\\pgfusepath{discard}}}\n");
5409  break;
5410  case GL2PS_SPECIAL :
5411  /* alignment contains the format for which the special output text
5412  is intended */
5413  if (prim->data.text->alignment == GL2PS_PGF)
5414  fprintf(gl2ps->stream, "%s\n", prim->data.text->str);
5415  break;
5416  default :
5417  break;
5418  }
5419 }

5423  fprintf(gl2ps->stream, "\\end{pgfpicture}\n");
