5491 /*********************************************************************
5492  *
5493  * General primitive printing routine
5494  *
5495  *********************************************************************/
5496 
5497 /* Warning: the ordering of the backends must match the format
5498  #defines in gl2ps.h */
5499 
5500 static GL2PSbackend *gl2psbackends[] = {
5501  &gl2psPS, /* 0 */
5502  &gl2psEPS, /* 1 */
5503  &gl2psTEX, /* 2 */
5504  &gl2psPDF, /* 3 */
5505  &gl2psSVG, /* 4 */
5506  &gl2psPGF /* 5 */
5507 };
5508 
5509 static void gl2psComputeTightBoundingBox(void *data)
5510 {
5511  GL2PSprimitive *prim;
5512  int i;
5513 
5514  prim = *(GL2PSprimitive**)data;
5515 
5516  for(i = 0; i < prim->numverts; i++){
5517  if(prim->verts[i].xyz[0] < gl2ps->viewport[0])
5518  gl2ps->viewport[0] = (GLint)prim->verts[i].xyz[0];
5519  if(prim->verts[i].xyz[0] > gl2ps->viewport[2])
5520  gl2ps->viewport[2] = (GLint)(prim->verts[i].xyz[0] + 0.5F);
5521  if(prim->verts[i].xyz[1] < gl2ps->viewport[1])
5522  gl2ps->viewport[1] = (GLint)prim->verts[i].xyz[1];
5523  if(prim->verts[i].xyz[1] > gl2ps->viewport[3])
5524  gl2ps->viewport[3] = (GLint)(prim->verts[i].xyz[1] + 0.5F);
5525  }
5526 }
5527 
5528 static GLint gl2psPrintPrimitives(void)
5529 {
5530  GL2PSbsptree *root;
5531  GL2PSxyz eye = {0.0F, 0.0F, 100.0F * GL2PS_ZSCALE};
5532  GLint used;
5533 
5534  used = glRenderMode(GL_RENDER);
5535 
5536  if(used < 0){
5537  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_INFO, "OpenGL feedback buffer overflow");
5538  return GL2PS_OVERFLOW;
5539  }
5540 
5541  if(used > 0)
5542  gl2psParseFeedbackBuffer(used);
5543 
5544  gl2psRescaleAndOffset();
5545 
5546  if(gl2ps->header){
5547  if(gl2psListNbr(gl2ps->primitives) &&
5548  (gl2ps->options & GL2PS_TIGHT_BOUNDING_BOX)){
5549  gl2ps->viewport[0] = gl2ps->viewport[1] = 100000;
5550  gl2ps->viewport[2] = gl2ps->viewport[3] = -100000;
5551  gl2psListAction(gl2ps->primitives, gl2psComputeTightBoundingBox);
5552  }
5553  (gl2psbackends[gl2ps->format]->printHeader)();
5554  gl2ps->header = GL_FALSE;
5555  }
5556 
5557  if(!gl2psListNbr(gl2ps->primitives)){
5558  /* empty feedback buffer and/or nothing else to print */
5559  return GL2PS_NO_FEEDBACK;
5560  }
5561 
5562  switch(gl2ps->sort){
5563  case GL2PS_NO_SORT :
5564  gl2psListAction(gl2ps->primitives, gl2psbackends[gl2ps->format]->printPrimitive);
5565  gl2psListAction(gl2ps->primitives, gl2psFreePrimitive);
5566  /* reset the primitive list, waiting for the next viewport */
5567  gl2psListReset(gl2ps->primitives);
5568  break;
5569  case GL2PS_SIMPLE_SORT :
5570  gl2psListSort(gl2ps->primitives, gl2psCompareDepth);
5571  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_OCCLUSION_CULL){
5572  gl2psListActionInverse(gl2ps->primitives, gl2psAddInImageTree);
5573  gl2psFreeBspImageTree(&gl2ps->imagetree);
5574  }
5575  gl2psListAction(gl2ps->primitives, gl2psbackends[gl2ps->format]->printPrimitive);
5576  gl2psListAction(gl2ps->primitives, gl2psFreePrimitive);
5577  /* reset the primitive list, waiting for the next viewport */
5578  gl2psListReset(gl2ps->primitives);
5579  break;
5580  case GL2PS_BSP_SORT :
5581  root = (GL2PSbsptree*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSbsptree));
5582  gl2psBuildBspTree(root, gl2ps->primitives);
5583  if(GL_TRUE == gl2ps->boundary) gl2psBuildPolygonBoundary(root);
5584  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_OCCLUSION_CULL){
5585  gl2psTraverseBspTree(root, eye, -GL2PS_EPSILON, gl2psLess,
5586  gl2psAddInImageTree, 1);
5587  gl2psFreeBspImageTree(&gl2ps->imagetree);
5588  }
5589  gl2psTraverseBspTree(root, eye, GL2PS_EPSILON, gl2psGreater,
5590  gl2psbackends[gl2ps->format]->printPrimitive, 0);
5591  gl2psFreeBspTree(&root);
5592  /* reallocate the primitive list (it's been deleted by
5593  gl2psBuildBspTree) in case there is another viewport */
5594  gl2ps->primitives = gl2psListCreate(500, 500, sizeof(GL2PSprimitive*));
5595  break;
5596  }
5597  gl2psbackends[gl2ps->format]->printFinalPrimitive();
5598 
5599  return GL2PS_SUCCESS;
5600 }
5601 
5602 /*********************************************************************
5603  *
5604  * Public routines
5605  *
5606  *********************************************************************/
5607 
5608 GL2PSDLL_API GLint gl2psBeginPage(const char *title, const char *producer,
5609  GLint viewport[4], GLint format, GLint sort,
5610  GLint options, GLint colormode,
5611  GLint colorsize, GL2PSrgba *colormap,
5612  GLint nr, GLint ng, GLint nb, GLint buffersize,
5613  FILE *stream, const char *filename)
5614 {
5615  GLint index;
5616  int i;
5617 
5618  if(gl2ps){
5619  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "gl2psBeginPage called in wrong program state");
5620  return GL2PS_ERROR;
5621  }
5622 
5623  gl2ps = (GL2PScontext*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PScontext));
5624 
5625  if(format >= 0 && format < (GLint)(sizeof(gl2psbackends) / sizeof(gl2psbackends[0]))){
5626  gl2ps->format = format;
5627  }
5628  else {
5629  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Unknown output format: %d", format);
5630  gl2psFree(gl2ps);
5631  gl2ps = NULL;
5632  return GL2PS_ERROR;
5633  }
5634 
5635  switch(sort){
5636  case GL2PS_NO_SORT :
5637  case GL2PS_SIMPLE_SORT :
5638  case GL2PS_BSP_SORT :
5639  gl2ps->sort = sort;
5640  break;
5641  default :
5642  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Unknown sorting algorithm: %d", sort);
5643  gl2psFree(gl2ps);
5644  gl2ps = NULL;
5645  return GL2PS_ERROR;
5646  }
5647 
5648  if(stream){
5649  gl2ps->stream = stream;
5650  }
5651  else{
5652  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Bad file pointer");
5653  gl2psFree(gl2ps);
5654  gl2ps = NULL;
5655  return GL2PS_ERROR;
5656  }
5657 
5658  gl2ps->header = GL_TRUE;
5659  gl2ps->maxbestroot = 10;
5660  gl2ps->options = options;
5661  gl2ps->compress = NULL;
5662  gl2ps->imagemap_head = NULL;
5663  gl2ps->imagemap_tail = NULL;
5664 
5665  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_USE_CURRENT_VIEWPORT){
5666  glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, gl2ps->viewport);
5667  }
5668  else{
5669  for(i = 0; i < 4; i++){
5670  gl2ps->viewport[i] = viewport[i];
5671  }
5672  }
5673 
5674  if(!gl2ps->viewport[2] || !gl2ps->viewport[3]){
5675  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Incorrect viewport (x=%d, y=%d, width=%d, height=%d)",
5676  gl2ps->viewport[0], gl2ps->viewport[1],
5677  gl2ps->viewport[2], gl2ps->viewport[3]);
5678  gl2psFree(gl2ps);
5679  gl2ps = NULL;
5680  return GL2PS_ERROR;
5681  }
5682 
5683  gl2ps->threshold[0] = nr ? 1.0F / (GLfloat)nr : 0.064F;
5684  gl2ps->threshold[1] = ng ? 1.0F / (GLfloat)ng : 0.034F;
5685  gl2ps->threshold[2] = nb ? 1.0F / (GLfloat)nb : 0.100F;
5686  gl2ps->colormode = colormode;
5687  gl2ps->buffersize = buffersize > 0 ? buffersize : 2048 * 2048;
5688  for(i = 0; i < 3; i++){
5689  gl2ps->lastvertex.xyz[i] = -1.0F;
5690  }
5691  for(i = 0; i < 4; i++){
5692  gl2ps->lastvertex.rgba[i] = -1.0F;
5693  gl2ps->lastrgba[i] = -1.0F;
5694  }
5695  gl2ps->lastlinewidth = -1.0F;
5696  gl2ps->lastpattern = 0;
5697  gl2ps->lastfactor = 0;
5698  gl2ps->imagetree = NULL;
5699  gl2ps->primitivetoadd = NULL;
5700  gl2ps->zerosurfacearea = GL_FALSE;
5701  gl2ps->pdfprimlist = NULL;
5702  gl2ps->pdfgrouplist = NULL;
5703  gl2ps->xreflist = NULL;
5704 
5705  /* get default blending mode from current OpenGL state (enabled by
5706  default for SVG) */
5707  gl2ps->blending = (gl2ps->format == GL2PS_SVG) ? GL_TRUE : glIsEnabled(GL_BLEND);
5708  glGetIntegerv(GL_BLEND_SRC, &gl2ps->blendfunc[0]);
5709  glGetIntegerv(GL_BLEND_DST, &gl2ps->blendfunc[1]);
5710 
5711  if(gl2ps->colormode == GL_RGBA){
5712  gl2ps->colorsize = 0;
5713  gl2ps->colormap = NULL;
5714  glGetFloatv(GL_COLOR_CLEAR_VALUE, gl2ps->bgcolor);
5715  }
5716  else if(gl2ps->colormode == GL_COLOR_INDEX){
5717  if(!colorsize || !colormap){
5718  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Missing colormap for GL_COLOR_INDEX rendering");
5719  gl2psFree(gl2ps);
5720  gl2ps = NULL;
5721  return GL2PS_ERROR;
5722  }
5723  gl2ps->colorsize = colorsize;
5724  gl2ps->colormap = (GL2PSrgba*)gl2psMalloc(gl2ps->colorsize * sizeof(GL2PSrgba));
5725  memcpy(gl2ps->colormap, colormap, gl2ps->colorsize * sizeof(GL2PSrgba));
5726  glGetIntegerv(GL_INDEX_CLEAR_VALUE, &index);
5727  gl2ps->bgcolor[0] = gl2ps->colormap[index][0];
5728  gl2ps->bgcolor[1] = gl2ps->colormap[index][1];
5729  gl2ps->bgcolor[2] = gl2ps->colormap[index][2];
5730  gl2ps->bgcolor[3] = 1.0F;
5731  }
5732  else{
5733  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "Unknown color mode in gl2psBeginPage");
5734  gl2psFree(gl2ps);
5735  gl2ps = NULL;
5736  return GL2PS_ERROR;
5737  }
5738 
5739  if(!title){
5740  gl2ps->title = (char*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(char));
5741  gl2ps->title[0] = '\0';
5742  }
5743  else{
5744  gl2ps->title = (char*)gl2psMalloc((strlen(title)+1)*sizeof(char));
5745  strcpy(gl2ps->title, title);
5746  }
5747 
5748  if(!producer){
5749  gl2ps->producer = (char*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(char));
5750  gl2ps->producer[0] = '\0';
5751  }
5752  else{
5753  gl2ps->producer = (char*)gl2psMalloc((strlen(producer)+1)*sizeof(char));
5754  strcpy(gl2ps->producer, producer);
5755  }
5756 
5757  if(!filename){
5758  gl2ps->filename = (char*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(char));
5759  gl2ps->filename[0] = '\0';
5760  }
5761  else{
5762  gl2ps->filename = (char*)gl2psMalloc((strlen(filename)+1)*sizeof(char));
5763  strcpy(gl2ps->filename, filename);
5764  }
5765 
5766  gl2ps->primitives = gl2psListCreate(500, 500, sizeof(GL2PSprimitive*));
5767  gl2ps->auxprimitives = gl2psListCreate(100, 100, sizeof(GL2PSprimitive*));
5768  gl2ps->feedback = (GLfloat*)gl2psMalloc(gl2ps->buffersize * sizeof(GLfloat));
5769  glFeedbackBuffer(gl2ps->buffersize, GL_3D_COLOR, gl2ps->feedback);
5770  glRenderMode(GL_FEEDBACK);
5771 
5772  return GL2PS_SUCCESS;
5773 }
5774 
5775 GL2PSDLL_API GLint gl2psEndPage(void)
5776 {
5777  GLint res;
5778 
5779  if(!gl2ps) return GL2PS_UNINITIALIZED;
5780 
5781  res = gl2psPrintPrimitives();
5782 
5783  if(res != GL2PS_OVERFLOW)
5784  (gl2psbackends[gl2ps->format]->printFooter)();
5785 
5786  fflush(gl2ps->stream);
5787 
5788  gl2psListDelete(gl2ps->primitives);
5789  gl2psListDelete(gl2ps->auxprimitives);
5790  gl2psFreeImagemap(gl2ps->imagemap_head);
5791  gl2psFree(gl2ps->colormap);
5792  gl2psFree(gl2ps->title);
5793  gl2psFree(gl2ps->producer);
5794  gl2psFree(gl2ps->filename);
5795  gl2psFree(gl2ps->feedback);
5796  gl2psFree(gl2ps);
5797  gl2ps = NULL;
5798 
5799  return res;
5800 }

5841 GL2PSDLL_API GLint gl2psDrawPixels(GLsizei width, GLsizei height,
5842  GLint xorig, GLint yorig,
5843  GLenum format, GLenum type,
5844  const void *pixels)
5845 {
5846  int size, i;
5847  const GLfloat *piv;
5848  GLfloat pos[4], zoom_x, zoom_y;
5849  GL2PSprimitive *prim;
5850  GLboolean valid;
5851 
5852  if(!gl2ps || !pixels) return GL2PS_UNINITIALIZED;
5853 
5854  if((width <= 0) || (height <= 0)) return GL2PS_ERROR;
5855 
5856  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_NO_PIXMAP) return GL2PS_SUCCESS;
5857 
5858  if((format != GL_RGB && format != GL_RGBA) || type != GL_FLOAT){
5859  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_ERROR, "gl2psDrawPixels only implemented for "
5860  "GL_RGB/GL_RGBA, GL_FLOAT pixels");
5861  return GL2PS_ERROR;
5862  }
5863 
5864  glGetBooleanv(GL_CURRENT_RASTER_POSITION_VALID, &valid);
5865  if(GL_FALSE == valid) return GL2PS_SUCCESS; /* the primitive is culled */
5866 
5867  glGetFloatv(GL_CURRENT_RASTER_POSITION, pos);
5868  glGetFloatv(GL_ZOOM_X, &zoom_x);
5869  glGetFloatv(GL_ZOOM_Y, &zoom_y);
5870 
5871  prim = (GL2PSprimitive*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSprimitive));
5872  prim->type = GL2PS_PIXMAP;
5873  prim->boundary = 0;
5874  prim->numverts = 1;
5875  prim->verts = (GL2PSvertex*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSvertex));
5876  prim->verts[0].xyz[0] = pos[0] + xorig;
5877  prim->verts[0].xyz[1] = pos[1] + yorig;
5878  prim->verts[0].xyz[2] = pos[2];
5879  prim->culled = 0;
5880  prim->offset = 0;
5881  prim->pattern = 0;
5882  prim->factor = 0;
5883  prim->width = 1;
5884  glGetFloatv(GL_CURRENT_RASTER_COLOR, prim->verts[0].rgba);
5885  prim->data.image = (GL2PSimage*)gl2psMalloc(sizeof(GL2PSimage));
5886  prim->data.image->width = width;
5887  prim->data.image->height = height;
5888  prim->data.image->zoom_x = zoom_x;
5889  prim->data.image->zoom_y = zoom_y;
5890  prim->data.image->format = format;
5891  prim->data.image->type = type;
5892 
5893  switch(format){
5894  case GL_RGBA:
5895  if(gl2ps->options & GL2PS_NO_BLENDING || !gl2ps->blending){
5896  /* special case: blending turned off */
5897  prim->data.image->format = GL_RGB;
5898  size = height * width * 3;
5899  prim->data.image->pixels = (GLfloat*)gl2psMalloc(size * sizeof(GLfloat));
5900  piv = (const GLfloat*)pixels;
5901  for(i = 0; i < size; ++i, ++piv){
5902  prim->data.image->pixels[i] = *piv;
5903  if(!((i + 1) % 3))
5904  ++piv;
5905  }
5906  }
5907  else{
5908  size = height * width * 4;
5909  prim->data.image->pixels = (GLfloat*)gl2psMalloc(size * sizeof(GLfloat));
5910  memcpy(prim->data.image->pixels, pixels, size * sizeof(GLfloat));
5911  }
5912  break;
5913  case GL_RGB:
5914  default:
5915  size = height * width * 3;
5916  prim->data.image->pixels = (GLfloat*)gl2psMalloc(size * sizeof(GLfloat));
5917  memcpy(prim->data.image->pixels, pixels, size * sizeof(GLfloat));
5918  break;
5919  }
5920 
5921  gl2psListAdd(gl2ps->auxprimitives, &prim);
5922  glPassThrough(GL2PS_DRAW_PIXELS_TOKEN);
5923 
5924  return GL2PS_SUCCESS;
5925 }
5926 
5927 GL2PSDLL_API GLint gl2psDrawImageMap(GLsizei width, GLsizei height,
5928  const GLfloat position[3],
5929  const unsigned char *imagemap){
5930  int size, i;
5931  int sizeoffloat = sizeof(GLfloat);
5932 
5933  if(!gl2ps || !imagemap) return GL2PS_UNINITIALIZED;
5934 
5935  if((width <= 0) || (height <= 0)) return GL2PS_ERROR;
5936 
5937  size = height + height * ((width - 1) / 8);
5938  glPassThrough(GL2PS_IMAGEMAP_TOKEN);
5939  glBegin(GL_POINTS);
5940  glVertex3f(position[0], position[1],position[2]);
5941  glEnd();
5942  glPassThrough((GLfloat)width);
5943  glPassThrough((GLfloat)height);
5944  for(i = 0; i < size; i += sizeoffloat){
5945  const float *value = (const float*)imagemap;
5946  glPassThrough(*value);
5947  imagemap += sizeoffloat;
5948  }
5949  return GL2PS_SUCCESS;
5950 }
5951 
5952 GL2PSDLL_API GLint gl2psEnable(GLint mode)
5953 {
5954  GLint tmp;
5955 
5956  if(!gl2ps) return GL2PS_UNINITIALIZED;
5957 
5958  switch(mode){
5959  case GL2PS_POLYGON_OFFSET_FILL :
5960  glPassThrough(GL2PS_BEGIN_OFFSET_TOKEN);
5961  glGetFloatv(GL_POLYGON_OFFSET_FACTOR, &gl2ps->offset[0]);
5962  glGetFloatv(GL_POLYGON_OFFSET_UNITS, &gl2ps->offset[1]);
5963  break;
5964  case GL2PS_POLYGON_BOUNDARY :
5965  glPassThrough(GL2PS_BEGIN_BOUNDARY_TOKEN);
5966  break;
5967  case GL2PS_LINE_STIPPLE :
5968  glPassThrough(GL2PS_BEGIN_STIPPLE_TOKEN);
5969  glGetIntegerv(GL_LINE_STIPPLE_PATTERN, &tmp);
5970  glPassThrough((GLfloat)tmp);
5971  glGetIntegerv(GL_LINE_STIPPLE_REPEAT, &tmp);
5972  glPassThrough((GLfloat)tmp);
5973  break;
5974  case GL2PS_BLEND :
5975  glPassThrough(GL2PS_BEGIN_BLEND_TOKEN);
5976  break;
5977  default :
5978  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_WARNING, "Unknown mode in gl2psEnable: %d", mode);
5979  return GL2PS_WARNING;
5980  }
5981 
5982  return GL2PS_SUCCESS;
5983 }
5984 
5985 GL2PSDLL_API GLint gl2psDisable(GLint mode)
5986 {
5987  if(!gl2ps) return GL2PS_UNINITIALIZED;
5988 
5989  switch(mode){
5990  case GL2PS_POLYGON_OFFSET_FILL :
5991  glPassThrough(GL2PS_END_OFFSET_TOKEN);
5992  break;
5993  case GL2PS_POLYGON_BOUNDARY :
5994  glPassThrough(GL2PS_END_BOUNDARY_TOKEN);
5995  break;
5996  case GL2PS_LINE_STIPPLE :
5997  glPassThrough(GL2PS_END_STIPPLE_TOKEN);
5998  break;
5999  case GL2PS_BLEND :
6000  glPassThrough(GL2PS_END_BLEND_TOKEN);
6001  break;
6002  default :
6003  gl2psMsg(GL2PS_WARNING, "Unknown mode in gl2psDisable: %d", mode);
6004  return GL2PS_WARNING;
6005  }
6006 
6007  return GL2PS_SUCCESS;
6008 }
